title.zh: 卷六 孝順孝沖孝質帝紀
title.en: Volume 6: Annals of Emperor Xiaoshun; Emperor Xiaochong; Emperor Xiaozhi
title.raw: 卷六 孝順孝沖孝質帝紀 Volume 6: Annals of Emperor Xiaoshun; Emperor Xiaochong; Emperor Xiaozhi

sentences.zh: 十二月甲申，以少府河南陶敦為司空。

translations.literal: Twelfth month, JiaShen day: Appointed Lesser Treasury Henan Tao Dun as Minister of Works.
translations.idiomatic: On the JiaShen day of the twelfth month, Tao Dun of Henan, Lesser Treasury, was appointed Minister of Works.

sentences.zh: 令郡國守、相視事未滿歲者，一切得舉孝廉吏。

translations.literal: Ordered commandery kingdom governors chancellors serving less than one year, all able to recommend filial worthy officials.
translations.idiomatic: Commandery and kingdom governors and chancellors who had served less than one year were ordered to all be able to recommend filial worthy officials.

sentences.zh: 癸卯，尚書奏請下有司，收還延光三年九月丁酉以皇太子為濟陰王詔書。

translations.literal: GuiMao day: Masters of Writing memorial requested send to relevant offices, retrieve and return Yanguang third year ninth month DingYou Crown Prince made Jiyin King edict document.
translations.idiomatic: On the GuiMao day, the Masters of Writing submitted a memorial requesting that relevant offices retrieve and return the edict document from the DingYou day of the ninth month of the third year of Yanguang that made the Crown Prince King of Jiyin.

sentences.zh: 奏可。

translations.literal: Memorial approved.
translations.idiomatic: The memorial was approved.

sentences.zh: 京師大疫。

translations.literal: Capital great epidemic.
translations.idiomatic: There was a great epidemic in the capital.

sentences.zh: 辛亥，詔公卿、郡守、國相，舉賢良方正、能直言極諫之士各一人。

translations.literal: XinHai day: Decreed dukes ministers, commandery governors, kingdom chancellors, recommend worthy upright, able to speak directly extreme remonstrate scholars each one person.
translations.idiomatic: On the XinHai day, dukes and ministers, commandery governors, and kingdom chancellors were decreed to recommend one person each who were worthy and upright, able to speak directly and remonstrate extremely.

sentences.zh: 尚書令以下從輦幸南宮者，皆增秩賜布各有差。

translations.literal: Masters of Writing Director and below followed carriage visited Southern Palace, all increased rank granted cloth each graded.
translations.idiomatic: The Masters of Writing Director and below who followed the carriage to visit the Southern Palace all had their ranks increased and were granted cloth in graded amounts.

sentences.zh: 永建元年春正月甲寅，詔曰：『先帝聖德，享祚未永，早弃鴻烈。

translations.literal: Yongjian first year spring first month JiaYin, decree said: 'Previous emperor sage virtue, enjoyed mandate not long, early abandoned great achievement.
translations.idiomatic: On the JiaYin day of the first month of spring in the first year of Yongjian, a decree stated: 'The previous emperor's sage virtue enjoyed a mandate that was not long; he early abandoned the great achievement.

sentences.zh: 奸慝緣間，人庶怨讟，上干和氣，疫癘為災。

translations.literal: Evil ones took advantage of gaps, people resented and complained, above disturbed harmonious qi, epidemics became disaster.
translations.idiomatic: Evil ones took advantage of the gaps; the people resented and complained; above, this disturbed the harmonious qi, and epidemics became disasters.

sentences.zh: 朕奉承大業，未能寧濟。

translations.literal: I receive and support great enterprise, unable to pacify and aid.
translations.idiomatic: I receive and support the great enterprise, but have been unable to pacify and aid.

sentences.zh: 蓋至理之本，稽弘德惠，蕩滌宿惡，與人更始。

translations.literal: Indeed utmost principle foundation, examine expand virtue favor, wash away old evils, with people new beginning.
translations.idiomatic: Indeed, the foundation of utmost principle is to examine and expand virtuous favor, wash away old evils, and make a new beginning with the people.

sentences.zh: 其大赦天下。

translations.literal: Therefore great amnesty throughout the realm.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore, grant a general amnesty throughout the empire.

sentences.zh: 賜男子爵，人二級，為父後、三老、孝悌、力田人三級，流民欲自占者一級；

translations.literal: Granted males nobility ranks, each person two ranks, successors to fathers, three elders, filial respectful, diligent farmers each person three ranks, displaced people wishing to register themselves one rank;
translations.idiomatic: Males were granted nobility ranks—two ranks each; successors to fathers, three elders, those who were filial and respectful, and diligent farmers received three ranks each; displaced people wishing to register themselves received one rank;

sentences.zh: 鰥、寡、孤、獨、篤癃、貧不能自存者粟，人五斛；

translations.literal: Widowers, widows, orphans, solitaries, seriously ill and disabled, poor unable to support themselves grain, each person five dou;
translations.idiomatic: Widowers, widows, orphans, solitaries, the seriously ill and disabled, and the poor unable to support themselves received grain—five dou each;

sentences.zh: 貞婦帛，人三匹。

translations.literal: Chaste women silk, each person three bolts.
translations.idiomatic: Chaste women received silk—three bolts each.

sentences.zh: 坐法當徙，勿徙；

translations.literal: Convicted by law should relocate, do not relocate;
translations.idiomatic: Those convicted by law who should be relocated shall not be relocated;

sentences.zh: 亡徒當傳，勿傳。

translations.literal: Fugitive convicts should be transmitted, do not transmit.
translations.idiomatic: Fugitive convicts who should be transmitted shall not be transmitted.

sentences.zh: 宗室以罪絕，皆復屬籍。

translations.literal: Imperial clan severed by crimes, all restored to registers.
translations.idiomatic: Members of the imperial clan who were severed due to crimes were all restored to the registers.

sentences.zh: 其與閻顯、江京等交通者，悉勿考。

translations.literal: Those who associated with Yan Xian, Jiang Jing and others, all do not investigate.
translations.idiomatic: Those who associated with Yan Xian, Jiang Jing, and others shall all not be investigated.

sentences.zh: 勉修厥職，以康我民。』

translations.literal: Diligently perform their duties, to make my people prosperous.'
translations.idiomatic: Diligently perform their duties to make my people prosperous.'

sentences.zh: 辛未，皇太后閻氏崩。

translations.literal: Xinwei day: Empress Dowager Yan clan passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinwei day, Empress Dowager Yan passed away.

sentences.zh: 辛巳，太傅馮石、太尉劉熹、司徒李郃免。

translations.literal: Xinsi day: Grand Tutor Feng Shi, Grand Marshal Liu Xi, Minister of the Masses Li He dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinsi day, Grand Tutor Feng Shi, Grand Marshal Liu Xi, and Minister of the Masses Li He were dismissed.

sentences.zh: 二月甲申，葬安思皇后。

translations.literal: Second month, Jiashen day: Buried Empress AnSi.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiashen day of the second month, Empress AnSi was buried.

sentences.zh: 丙戌，太常桓焉為太傅；

translations.literal: Bingxu day: Grand Minister of Ceremonies Huan Yan became Grand Tutor;
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingxu day, Grand Minister of Ceremonies Huan Yan became Grand Tutor;

sentences.zh: 大鴻臚朱寵為太尉，參錄尚書事；

translations.literal: Grand Herald Zhu Chong became Grand Marshal, participated in recording Masters of Writing affairs;
translations.idiomatic: Grand Herald Zhu Chong became Grand Marshal and participated in recording Masters of Writing affairs;

sentences.zh: 長樂少府九江朱倀為司徒。

translations.literal: Changle Lesser Treasury Jiujiang Zhu Rang became Minister of the Masses.
translations.idiomatic: Zhu Rang of Jiujiang, Changle Lesser Treasury, became Minister of the Masses.

sentences.zh: 賜百官隨輦宿衛及拜除者布各有差。

translations.literal: Granted all officials following carriage on guard duty and those newly appointed or dismissed cloth each graded.
translations.idiomatic: All officials who followed the carriage on guard duty and those newly appointed or dismissed were granted cloth in graded amounts.

sentences.zh: 隴西鐘羌叛，護羌校尉馬賢討破之。

translations.literal: Longxi Zhong Qiang rebelled, Protector Qiang Colonel Ma Xian attacked and defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: The Zhong Qiang of Longxi rebelled; Protector Qiang Colonel Ma Xian attacked and defeated them.

sentences.zh: 夏五月丁丑，詔幽、幷、涼州刺史，使各實二千石以下至黃綬，年老劣弱不任軍事者，上名。

translations.literal: Summer, fifth month, Dingchou day: Decreed You, Bing, Liang province inspectors, make each report two thousand shi and below to yellow cords, aged feeble weak unfit for military affairs, submit names.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingchou day of the fifth month of summer, the inspectors of You, Bing, and Liang provinces were decreed to each report officials from two thousand shi rank and below to yellow cords who were aged, feeble, weak, and unfit for military affairs, submitting their names.

sentences.zh: 嚴勑障塞，繕設屯備，立秋之後，簡習戎馬。

translations.literal: Strictly ordered barrier fortifications, repair establish garrison preparations, after beginning of autumn, select practice arms horses.
translations.idiomatic: Strictly ordered the barrier fortifications to be repaired and garrison preparations established; after the beginning of autumn, select and practice with arms and horses.

sentences.zh: 六月己亥，封濟南王錯子顯為濟南王。

translations.literal: Sixth month, Jihai day: Enfeoffed Jinan King Cuo son Xian as Jinan King.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jihai day of the sixth month, King Cuo's son Xian of Jinan was enfeoffed as Jinan King.

sentences.zh: 秋七月庚午，衛尉來歷為車騎將軍。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month, Gengwu day: Guards Colonel Lai Li became Chariot Cavalry General.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengwu day of the seventh month of autumn, Guards Colonel Lai Li became Chariot Cavalry General.

sentences.zh: 八月，鮮卑寇代郡，代郡太守李超戰歿。

translations.literal: Eighth month: Xianbei invaded Dai commandery, Dai commandery Governor Li Chao died in battle.
translations.idiomatic: In the eighth month, the Xianbei invaded Dai commandery; Dai commandery Governor Li Chao died in battle.

sentences.zh: 九月辛亥，初令三公、尚書入奏事。

translations.literal: Ninth month, Xinhai day: First ordered Three Dukes, Masters of Writing to enter and memorialize affairs.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinhai day of the ninth month, it was first ordered that the Three Dukes and Masters of Writing enter to memorialize affairs.

sentences.zh: 冬十月辛巳，詔減死罪以下徙邊；

translations.literal: Winter, tenth month, Xinsi day: Decreed reduce death penalty and below to relocate to border;
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinsi day of the tenth month of winter, it was decreed to reduce sentences of death penalty and below to relocation to the border;

sentences.zh: 其亡命贖，各有差。

translations.literal: Those fugitives ransom, each graded.
translations.idiomatic: Fugitives were to be ransomed, each according to their circumstances.

sentences.zh: 丁亥，司空陶敦免。

translations.literal: Dinghai day: Minister of Works Tao Dun dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dinghai day, Minister of Works Tao Dun was dismissed.

sentences.zh: 鮮卑犯邊。

translations.literal: Xianbei violated the frontier.
translations.idiomatic: The Xianbei violated the frontier.

sentences.zh: 庚寅，遣黎陽營兵出屯中山北界。

translations.literal: Gengyin day: Dispatched Liyang garrison troops to go encamp at Zhongsan northern border.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengyin day, Liyang garrison troops were dispatched to encamp at the northern border of Zhongsan.

sentences.zh: 告幽州刺史，其令緣邊郡增置步兵，列屯塞下。

translations.literal: Informed You province inspector, order border commanderies along the edge to increase infantry placement, array encampments below the fortifications.
translations.idiomatic: The You province inspector was informed to order the border commanderies to increase infantry placement, arraying encampments below the fortifications.

sentences.zh: 調五營弩師，郡舉五人，令教習戰射。

translations.literal: Transferred five camps crossbow masters, commanderies recommend five persons each, order to teach practice battle archery.
translations.idiomatic: Crossbow masters from the five camps were transferred; each commandery was to recommend five persons to be ordered to teach and practice battle archery.

sentences.zh: 壬寅，廷尉張皓為司空。

translations.literal: Renyin day: Court Judge Zhang Hao became Minister of Works.
translations.idiomatic: On the Renyin day, Court Judge Zhang Hao became Minister of Works.

sentences.zh: 甲辰，詔以疫癘水潦，令人半輸今年田租；

translations.literal: Jiachen day: Decreed due to epidemics flooding, cause people half deliver this year field rents;
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiachen day, due to epidemics and flooding, it was decreed that people deliver half of this year's field rents;

sentences.zh: 傷害什四以上，勿收責；

translations.literal: Damaged harmed ten four above, do not collect demand;
translations.idiomatic: For those damaged or harmed by more than forty percent, do not collect or demand payment;

sentences.zh: 不滿者，以實除之。

translations.literal: Not reaching this level, according to actual damage exempt.
translations.idiomatic: For those not reaching this level, exempt according to the actual damage.

sentences.zh: 十二月辛巳，賜王、主、貴人、公卿以下布各有差。

translations.literal: Twelfth month, Xinsi day: Granted kings, princesses, noble ladies, dukes ministers and below cloth each graded.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinsi day of the twelfth month, kings, princesses, noble ladies, dukes, ministers, and below were granted cloth in graded amounts.

sentences.zh: 二年春正月戊申，樂安王鴻來朝。

translations.literal: Second year spring first month Wushen day: Le'an King Hong came to court.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wushen day of the first month of spring in the second year, King Hong of Le'an came to court.

sentences.zh: 丁卯，常山王章薨。

translations.literal: Dingmao day: Changshan King Zhang passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingmao day, King Zhang of Changshan passed away.

sentences.zh: 二月，鮮卑寇遼東、玄菟。

translations.literal: Second month: Xianbei invaded Liaodong, Xuanyu.
translations.idiomatic: In the second month, the Xianbei invaded Liaodong and Xuanyu.

sentences.zh: 甲辰，詔稟貸荊、豫、兗、冀四州流冗貧人，所在安業之；

translations.literal: Jiachen day: Decreed provide grain loans to Jing, Yu, Yan, Ji four provinces displaced destitute poor people, at their locations settle them in occupations;
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiachen day, it was decreed to provide grain loans to the displaced and destitute poor people in the four provinces of Jing, Yu, Yan, and Ji, and settle them in occupations at their locations;

sentences.zh: 疾病致醫藥。

translations.literal: For illnesses provide medicine.
translations.idiomatic: For illnesses, provide medicine.

sentences.zh: 護烏桓校尉耿曄率南單于擊鮮卑，破之。

translations.literal: Protector Wuhuan Colonel Geng Ye led Southern Chanyu attacked Xianbei, defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: Protector Wuhuan Colonel Geng Ye led the Southern Chanyu to attack the Xianbei and defeated them.

sentences.zh: 三月，旱，遣使者錄囚徒。

translations.literal: Third month: Drought, dispatched envoys to examine prisoners.
translations.idiomatic: In the third month, there was drought; envoys were dispatched to examine the prisoners.

sentences.zh: 疏勒國遣使奉獻。

translations.literal: Shule kingdom dispatched envoys to present tribute.
translations.idiomatic: The Shule kingdom dispatched envoys to present tribute.

sentences.zh: 夏六月乙酉，追尊謚皇妣李氏為恭愍皇后，葬於恭北陵。

translations.literal: Summer, sixth month, YiYou day: Posthumously honored and gave temple name to imperial mother Li clan as GongMin Empress, buried at Gongbei tomb.
translations.idiomatic: On the YiYou day of the sixth month of summer, the imperial mother of the Li clan was posthumously honored with the temple name GongMin Empress and buried at the Gongbei tomb.

sentences.zh: 西域長史班勇、敦煌太守張朗討焉耆、尉犁、危須三國，破之；

translations.literal: Western Regions Chief Ban Yong, Dunhuang Governor Zhang Lang attacked Yanqi, Yuli, Weixu three kingdoms, defeated them;
translations.idiomatic: Western Regions Chief Ban Yong and Dunhuang Governor Zhang Lang attacked the three kingdoms of Yanqi, Yuli, and Weixu, defeating them;

sentences.zh: 並遣子貢獻。

translations.literal: All dispatched sons to present tribute.
translations.idiomatic: All dispatched their sons to present tribute.

sentences.zh: 秋七月甲戌朔，日有食之。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month, JiaXu first day: there was a solar eclipse.
translations.idiomatic: On the first day of the seventh month of autumn (JiaXu), there was a solar eclipse.

sentences.zh: 壬午，太尉朱寵、司徒朱倀罷。

translations.literal: Renwu day: Grand Marshal Zhu Chong, Minister of the Masses Zhu Rang dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Renwu day, Grand Marshal Zhu Chong and Minister of the Masses Zhu Rang were dismissed.

sentences.zh: 庚子，太常劉光為太尉，錄尚書事；

translations.literal: Gengzi day: Grand Minister of Ceremonies Liu Guang became Grand Marshal, recorded Masters of Writing affairs;
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengzi day, Grand Minister of Ceremonies Liu Guang became Grand Marshal and recorded Masters of Writing affairs;

sentences.zh: 光祿勳許敬為司徒。

translations.literal: Grand Provisioner Xu Jing became Minister of the Masses.
translations.idiomatic: Grand Provisioner Xu Jing became Minister of the Masses.

sentences.zh: 辛丑，下邳王成薨。

translations.literal: Xinchou day: Xiapi King Cheng passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinchou day, King Cheng of Xiapi passed away.

sentences.zh: 三年春正月丙子，京師地震，漢陽地陷裂。

translations.literal: Third year spring first month Bingzi day: Capital earthquake, Hanyang ground sank and cracked.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingzi day of the first month of spring in the third year, there was an earthquake in the capital, and the ground in Hanyang sank and cracked.

sentences.zh: 甲午，詔實覈傷害者，賜年七歲以上錢，人二千；

translations.literal: Jiawu day: Decreed truly investigate those harmed, grant seven years above money, each person two thousand;
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiawu day, it was decreed to truly investigate those harmed and grant money—two thousand cash each—to those seven years old and above;

sentences.zh: 一家被害，郡縣為收斂。

translations.literal: Entire family harmed, commandery county collect for them.
translations.idiomatic: If an entire family was harmed, the commandery and county would collect aid for them.

sentences.zh: 乙未，詔勿收漢陽今年田租、口賦。

translations.literal: Yiwei day: Decreed do not collect Hanyang this year field rents, head taxes.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yiwei day, it was decreed not to collect field rents or head taxes from Hanyang for this year.

sentences.zh: 秋七月丁酉，茂陵園寢灾，帝縞素避正殿。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month, Dingyou day: Maoling garden resting hall disaster, Emperor wore mourning avoided main hall.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingyou day of the seventh month of autumn, the resting hall in the Maoling garden suffered a disaster; the Emperor wore mourning and avoided the main hall.

sentences.zh: 辛亥，使太常王龔持節告祠茂陵。

translations.literal: Xinhai day: Sent Grand Minister of Ceremonies Wang Gong holding tally to inform and sacrifice at Maoling.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinhai day, Grand Minister of Ceremonies Wang Gong was sent holding the imperial tally to inform and sacrifice at Maoling.

sentences.zh: 九月，鮮卑寇漁陽。

translations.literal: Ninth month: Xianbei invaded Yuyang.
translations.idiomatic: In the ninth month, the Xianbei invaded Yuyang.

sentences.zh: 冬十二月己亥，太傅桓焉免。

translations.literal: Winter, twelfth month, Jihai day: Grand Tutor Huan Yan dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jihai day of the twelfth month of winter, Grand Tutor Huan Yan was dismissed.

sentences.zh: 是歲，車騎將軍來歷罷。

translations.literal: This year: Chariot Cavalry General Lai Li dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: This year, Chariot Cavalry General Lai Li was dismissed.

sentences.zh: 四年春正月丙寅，詔曰：『朕托王公之上，涉道日寡，政失厥中，陰陽氣隔，寇盜肆暴，庶獄彌繁，憂悴永歎，疢如疾首。

translations.literal: Fourth year spring first month Bingyin, decree said: 'I am placed above the nobles and dukes, my path in the way daily few, governance loses its center, yin yang qi separated, bandits run rampant, numerous cases increasingly complex, anxious and haggard forever sighing, illness like a painful head.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingyin day of the first month of spring in the fourth year, a decree stated: 'I am placed above the nobles and dukes; my progress in the way is daily scarce; governance loses its center; yin and yang qi are separated; bandits run rampant; numerous cases become increasingly complex; anxious and haggard, I forever sigh; illness is like a painful head.

sentences.zh: 《詩》云：「君子如祉，亂庶遄已。」

translations.literal: 'The Poetry says: 'The gentleman is like good fortune, the chaos perhaps quickly ends.''
translations.idiomatic: 'The Poetry says: 'The gentleman is like good fortune; the chaos perhaps quickly ends.''

sentences.zh: 三朝之會，朔旦立春，嘉與海內洗心自新。

translations.literal: Three courts assembly, new moon morning beginning of spring, auspiciously with all within the seas wash hearts renew themselves.
translations.idiomatic: At the assembly of the three courts, on the new moon morning when spring begins, auspiciously with all within the seas, wash our hearts and renew ourselves.

sentences.zh: 其赦天下。

translations.literal: Therefore amnesty throughout the realm.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore, grant a general amnesty throughout the empire.

sentences.zh: 從甲寅赦令已來復秩屬籍，三年正月已來還贖。

translations.literal: From JiaYin amnesty decree since, restored ranks and registers, third year first month since returned ransoms.
translations.idiomatic: Since the JiaYin amnesty decree, ranks and registers have been restored; since the first month of the third year, ransoms have been returned.

sentences.zh: 其閻顯、江京等知識婚姻禁錮，一原除之。

translations.literal: Their Yan Xian, Jiang Jing and others' acquaintances marriages prohibitions, all pardon and remove them.
translations.idiomatic: The prohibitions on Yan Xian, Jiang Jing, and others' acquaintances and marriages are all pardoned and removed.

sentences.zh: 務崇寬和，敬順時令，遵典去苛，以稱朕意。』

translations.literal: Diligently honor broad harmony, respectfully follow seasonal commands, adhere to canons remove harshness, to match My intentions.'
translations.idiomatic: Diligently honor broad harmony; respectfully follow seasonal commands; adhere to canons and remove harshness; to match My intentions.'

sentences.zh: 丙子，帝加元服。

translations.literal: Bingzi day: The Emperor assumed the cap of manhood.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingzi day, the Emperor assumed the cap of manhood.

sentences.zh: 賜王、主、貴人、公卿以下金、帛各有差。

translations.literal: Granted kings, princesses, noble ladies, dukes ministers and below gold, silk each graded.
translations.idiomatic: Kings, princesses, noble ladies, dukes, ministers, and below were granted gold and silk in graded amounts.

sentences.zh: 賜男子爵及流民欲占者人一級。

translations.literal: Granted males nobility ranks and displaced people wishing to register each person one rank.
translations.idiomatic: Males were granted nobility ranks, and displaced people wishing to register received one rank each.

sentences.zh: 為父後、三老、孝悌、力田人二級；

translations.literal: Successors to fathers, three elders, filial respectful, diligent farmers each person two ranks;
translations.idiomatic: Successors to fathers, three elders, those who were filial and respectful, and diligent farmers received two ranks each;

sentences.zh: 鰥、寡、孤、獨、篤癃、貧不能自存帛，人一匹。

translations.literal: Widowers, widows, orphans, solitaries, seriously ill and disabled, poor unable to support themselves silk, each person one bolt.
translations.idiomatic: Widowers, widows, orphans, solitaries, the seriously ill and disabled, and the poor unable to support themselves received silk—one bolt each.

sentences.zh: 二月戊戌，詔以民入山鑿石，發泄藏氣，勑有司檢察所當禁絕，如建武、永平故事。

translations.literal: Second month Wuxu day: Decreed because people enter mountains quarry stone, vent hidden qi, command relevant officials inspect what should be prohibited, like Jianwu, Yongping precedents.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wuxu day of the second month, it was decreed that because people enter mountains to quarry stone and vent hidden qi, relevant officials should inspect what should be prohibited, following the precedents of Jianwu and Yongping.

sentences.zh: 夏五月壬辰，詔曰：『海內頗有灾異，朝廷修政，太官減膳，珍玩不御。

translations.literal: Summer, fifth month, Rencheng day, decree said: 'Within the seas there are somewhat calamities and anomalies, court corrects governance, imperial kitchen reduces meals, precious playthings not used.
translations.idiomatic: On the Rencheng day of the fifth month of summer, a decree stated: 'Within the seas there are somewhat calamities and anomalies; the court corrects governance; the imperial kitchen reduces meals; precious playthings are not used.

sentences.zh: 而桂陽太守文礱，不惟竭忠，宣暢本朝，而遠獻大珠，以求幸媚，今封以還之。』

translations.literal: Yet Guiyang Governor Wen Leng, not only exhausts loyalty, proclaims and spreads the fundamental court, yet far presents great pearl, to seek favor and flattery, now seal and return it.'
translations.idiomatic: Yet Guiyang Governor Wen Leng, not only exhausts loyalty and proclaims and spreads the fundamental court, but far presents a great pearl to seek favor and flattery; now seal and return it.'

sentences.zh: 五州雨水。

translations.literal: Five provinces flooding.
translations.idiomatic: There was flooding in five provinces.

sentences.zh: 秋八月庚子，遣使實覈死亡，收斂稟賜。

translations.literal: Autumn, eighth month, Gengzi day: Dispatched envoys to truly investigate deaths, collect and provide grain grants.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengzi day of the eighth month of autumn, envoys were dispatched to truly investigate deaths and collect and provide grain grants.

sentences.zh: 丁巳，太尉劉光、司空張皓免。

translations.literal: Dingsi day: Grand Marshal Liu Guang, Minister of Works Zhang Hao dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingsi day, Grand Marshal Liu Guang and Minister of Works Zhang Hao were dismissed.

sentences.zh: 九月，復安定、北地、上郡歸舊土。

translations.literal: Ninth month: Restored Anding, Beidi, Shangjun to return to old territories.
translations.idiomatic: In the ninth month, Anding, Beidi, and Shangjun were restored and returned to their old territories.

sentences.zh: 癸酉，大鴻臚龐參為太尉，錄尚書事。

translations.literal: Guiyou day: Grand Herald Pang Shen became Grand Marshal, recorded Masters of Writing affairs.
translations.idiomatic: On the Guiyou day, Grand Herald Pang Shen became Grand Marshal and recorded Masters of Writing affairs.

sentences.zh: 太常王龔為司空。

translations.literal: Grand Minister of Ceremonies Wang Gong became Minister of Works.
translations.idiomatic: Grand Minister of Ceremonies Wang Gong became Minister of Works.

sentences.zh: 冬十一月庚辰，司徒許敬免。

translations.literal: Winter, eleventh month, Gengchen day: Minister of the Masses Xu Jing dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengchen day of the eleventh month of winter, Minister of the Masses Xu Jing was dismissed.

sentences.zh: 鮮卑寇朔方。

translations.literal: Xianbei invaded Shuofang.
translations.idiomatic: The Xianbei invaded Shuofang.

sentences.zh: 十二月乙卯，宗正劉崎為司徒。

translations.literal: Twelfth month, Yimao day: Director of the Imperial Clan Liu Qi became Minister of the Masses.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yimao day of the twelfth month, Director of the Imperial Clan Liu Qi became Minister of the Masses.

sentences.zh: 是歲，分會稽為吳郡。

translations.literal: This year: Divided Kuaiji to make Wu commandery.
translations.idiomatic: This year, Kuaiji was divided to make Wu commandery.

sentences.zh: 拘彌國遣使貢獻。

translations.literal: Jumi kingdom dispatched envoys to present tribute.
translations.idiomatic: The Jumi kingdom dispatched envoys to present tribute.

sentences.zh: 五年春正月，疏勒王遣侍子，及大宛、莎車王皆奉使貢獻。

translations.literal: Fifth year spring first month: Shule king dispatched attendant son, and Dayuan, Shache kings all sent envoys to present tribute.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month of spring of the fifth year, the Shule king dispatched an attendant son, and the kings of Dayuan and Shache all sent envoys to present tribute.

sentences.zh: 夏四月，京師旱。

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month: Capital drought.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month of summer, there was drought in the capital.

sentences.zh: 辛巳，詔郡國貧人被灾者，勿收責今年過更。

translations.literal: Xinsi day: Decreed commanderies kingdoms poor people harmed by disaster, do not collect demand this year excess labor service.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinsi day, it was decreed that for poor people in the commanderies and kingdoms harmed by disaster, this year's excess labor service should not be collected or demanded.

sentences.zh: 京師及郡國十二蝗。

translations.literal: Capital and commanderies kingdoms twelve locust swarms.
translations.idiomatic: There were twelve locust swarms in the capital and commanderies/kingdoms.

sentences.zh: 冬十月丙辰，詔郡國中都官死罪繫囚皆減罪一等，詣北地、上郡、安定戍。

translations.literal: Winter, tenth month, Bingchen day: Decreed commanderies kingdoms capital officials death penalty imprisoned prisoners all reduce crime one rank, go to Beidi, Shangjun, Anding garrisons.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingchen day of the tenth month of winter, it was decreed that prisoners held by capital officials in the commanderies and kingdoms for death penalty crimes should all have their sentences reduced by one rank and be sent to the garrisons in Beidi, Shangjun, and Anding.

sentences.zh: 乙亥，定遠侯班始坐殺其妻陰城公主，腰斬，同產皆弃市。

translations.literal: Yihai day: Marquis of Dingyuan Ban Shi convicted of killing his wife Princess Yincheng, cut in two at waist, same mother siblings all executed in market.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yihai day, Marquis Ban Shi of Dingyuan was convicted of killing his wife Princess Yincheng; he was cut in two at the waist, and all his siblings of the same mother were executed in the market.

sentences.zh: 六年春二月庚午，河間王開薨。

translations.literal: Sixth year spring second month Gengwu day: Hejian King Kai passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengwu day of the second month of spring in the sixth year, King Kai of Hejian passed away.

sentences.zh: 三月辛亥，復伊吾屯田，復置伊吾司馬一人。

translations.literal: Third month Xinhai day: Restored Yiwu agricultural garrisons, restored placement of one Yiwu Colonel.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinhai day of the third month, the agricultural garrisons at Yiwu were restored, and one Yiwu Colonel was again placed there.

sentences.zh: 秋九月辛巳，繕起太學。

translations.literal: Autumn, ninth month, Xinsi day: Repaired and raised the Imperial University.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinsi day of the ninth month of autumn, the Imperial University was repaired and raised.

sentences.zh: 護烏桓校尉耿曄遣兵擊鮮卑，破之。

translations.literal: Protector of Wuhuan Colonel Geng Ye dispatched troops to strike Xianbei, defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: Protector of Wuhuan Colonel Geng Ye dispatched troops to attack the Xianbei and defeated them.

sentences.zh: 丁酉，於闐王遣侍子貢獻。

translations.literal: Dingchou day: Yutian king dispatched attendant son to present tribute.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingchou day, the king of Yutian dispatched an attendant son to present tribute.

sentences.zh: 冬十一月辛亥，詔曰：『連年灾潦，冀部尤甚。

translations.literal: Winter, eleventh month, Xinhai day, decree said: 'Successive years calamities and floods, Ji province especially severe.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinhai day of the eleventh month of winter, a decree stated: 'In successive years there have been calamities and floods, especially severe in Ji province.

sentences.zh: 比蠲除實傷，贍恤窮匱，而百姓猶有弃業，流亡不絕。

translations.literal: Recently remitted and exempted actual injuries, provided relief to impoverished and destitute, yet common people still have abandoned occupations, displaced and wandering without cease.
translations.idiomatic: Recently actual injuries have been remitted and exempted, and relief provided to the impoverished and destitute, yet the common people still have abandoned their occupations, and the displaced and wandering continue without cease.

sentences.zh: 疑郡縣用心怠惰，恩澤不宣。

translations.literal: Suspect commanderies counties use mind indolent lazy, beneficence and favor not proclaimed.
translations.idiomatic: I suspect that the commanderies and counties are indolent and lazy in their efforts, and that beneficence and favor are not being proclaimed.

sentences.zh: 《易》美「損上益下」，《書》稱「安民則惠」。

translations.literal: The Yijing praises "diminishing the above and benefiting the below", the Shangshu says "settle the people then bestow favor".
translations.idiomatic: The Yijing praises 'diminishing the above and benefiting the below'; the Shangshu says 'settle the people then bestow favor.'

sentences.zh: 其令冀部勿收今年田租、芻稾。』

translations.literal: Order Ji province not collect this year field rents, fodder straw.'
translations.idiomatic: Order Ji province not to collect this year's field rents or fodder straw.'

sentences.zh: 十二月，日南徼外葉調國、撣國遣使貢獻。

translations.literal: Twelfth month: Beyond the frontier of Rinan, Yediao kingdom, Shan kingdom dispatched envoys to present tribute.
translations.idiomatic: In the twelfth month, beyond the frontier of Rinan, the kingdoms of Yediao and Shan dispatched envoys to present tribute.

sentences.zh: 壬申，客星出牽牛。

translations.literal: Renchen day: Guest star appeared in Ox Leader.
translations.idiomatic: On the Renchen day, a guest star appeared in Ox Leader.

sentences.zh: 於闐王遣侍子詣闕貢獻。

translations.literal: Yutian king dispatched attendant son to approach the palace to present tribute.
translations.idiomatic: The king of Yutian dispatched an attendant son to approach the palace and present tribute.

sentences.zh: 陽嘉元年春正月乙巳，立皇后梁氏。

translations.literal: Yangjia first year spring first month Yisi day: Established Empress Liang clan.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yisi day of the first month of spring in the first year of Yangjia, Empress Liang was established.

sentences.zh: 賜爵，人二級，三老、孝悌、力田三級，爵過公乘，得移與子若同產、同產子，民無名數及流民欲占著者人一級；

translations.literal: Granted nobility ranks: each person two ranks, three elders, filial respectful, diligent farmers three ranks, nobility rank exceeding gentleman rider, may transfer to son or same mother siblings, same mother siblings' sons, people without registered names and displaced people wishing to register each person one rank;
translations.idiomatic: Nobility ranks were granted: each person two ranks; three elders, the filial and respectful, and diligent farmers received three ranks; for those whose nobility rank exceeded gentleman rider, it could be transferred to their son or same-mother siblings or same-mother siblings' sons; people without registered names and displaced people wishing to register received one rank each;

sentences.zh: 鰥、寡、孤、獨、篤癃、貧不能自存者粟，人五斛。

translations.literal: Widowers, widows, orphans, solitaries, seriously ill and disabled, poor unable to support themselves grain, each person five bushels.
translations.idiomatic: Widowers, widows, orphans, solitaries, the seriously ill and disabled, and the poor unable to support themselves received grain—five bushels each.

sentences.zh: 二月，海賊曾旌等寇會稽，殺句章、鄞、鄮三縣長，攻會稽東部都尉。

translations.literal: Second month: Sea bandits Zeng Jian and others invaded Kuaiji, killed the three county magistrates of Gouchang, Yin, and Mao, attacked Kuaiji eastern regional commander.
translations.idiomatic: In the second month, sea bandits Zeng Jian and others invaded Kuaiji, killed the magistrates of the three counties Gouchang, Yin, and Mao, and attacked the eastern regional commander of Kuaiji.

sentences.zh: 詔緣海縣各屯兵戍。

translations.literal: Decreed coastal counties each station troops for garrison duty.
translations.idiomatic: It was decreed that coastal counties should each station troops for garrison duty.

sentences.zh: 丁巳，皇后謁高廟、光武廟，詔稟甘陵貧人，大小口各有差。

translations.literal: Dingsi day: The Empress visited the Gao Temple and Guangwu Temple, decreed to provide provisions to poor people in Ganling, adults and children each graded.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingsi day, the Empress visited the Gao Temple and Guangwu Temple, and it was decreed that provisions should be provided to poor people in Ganling, graded according to adults and children.

sentences.zh: 京師旱。

translations.literal: Capital drought.
translations.idiomatic: There was drought in the capital.

sentences.zh: 庚申，勑郡國二千石各禱名山嶽瀆，遣大夫、謁者詣嵩高、首陽山，並祠河、洛，請雨。

translations.literal: Gengshen day: Commanded commanderies kingdoms two thousand shi each pray to famous mountains rivers and seas, dispatched grandees and attendants to Songgao, Shouyang Mountain, and simultaneously sacrifice to Yellow River, Luo, request rain.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengshen day, commanderies and kingdoms were commanded that officials of two thousand shi each should pray to famous mountains, rivers, and seas; grandees and attendants were dispatched to Songgao and Shouyang Mountain, and simultaneously sacrificed to the Yellow River and Luo to request rain.

sentences.zh: 戊辰，雩。

translations.literal: Wuchen day: Yu sacrifice.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wuchen day, a yu sacrifice was performed.

sentences.zh: 以冀部比年水潦，民食不贍，詔案行稟貸，勸農功，賑乏絕。

translations.literal: Because Ji province in recent years flooding, people's food not sufficient, decreed inspect and tour provide loans, encourage agricultural work, relieve destitute and severed.
translations.idiomatic: Because Ji province had flooding in recent years and the people's food was insufficient, it was decreed to inspect and tour, provide loans, encourage agricultural work, and relieve the destitute and severed.

sentences.zh: 甲戌，詔曰：『政失厥和，陰陽隔幷，冬鮮宿雪，春無澍雨。

translations.literal: Jiaxu day, decree said: 'Government lost its harmony, yin and yang separated and blocked, winter little old snow, spring no timely rain.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiaxu day, a decree stated: 'Government has lost its harmony; yin and yang are separated and blocked; winter has little old snow; spring has no timely rain.

sentences.zh: 分禱祈請，靡神不禜。

translations.literal: Divided prayers and petitions, no spirit not sacrificed to.
translations.idiomatic: Divided prayers and petitions have been made; no spirit has not been sacrificed to.

sentences.zh: 深恐在所慢違「如在」之義，今遣侍中王輔等，持節分詣岱山、東海、滎陽、河、洛，盡心祈焉。』

translations.literal: Deeply fear local officials indolently violate "as if present" meaning, now dispatch Attendant-in-Attendance Wang Fu and others, holding tallies separately go to Mount Tai, Eastern Sea, Xingyang, Yellow River, Luo, wholeheartedly pray.'
translations.idiomatic: I deeply fear that local officials are indolently violating the meaning of 'as if present'; now I dispatch Attendant-in-Attendance Wang Fu and others, holding tallies to separately go to Mount Tai, the Eastern Sea, Xingyang, the Yellow River, and Luo, to pray wholeheartedly.'

sentences.zh: 三月，楊州六郡妖賊章河等寇四十九縣，殺傷長吏。

translations.literal: Third month: Yang province six commanderies demon bandits Zhang He and others invaded forty-nine counties, killed and wounded county officials.
translations.idiomatic: In the third month, demon bandits Zhang He and others from six commanderies in Yang province invaded forty-nine counties and killed and wounded county officials.

sentences.zh: 庚寅，帝臨辟雍饗射，大赦天下，改元陽嘉。

translations.literal: Gengyin day: The Emperor attended the Biyong archery feast, granted general amnesty to the empire, changed era name to Yangjia.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengyin day, the Emperor attended the archery feast at the Biyong, granted a general amnesty to the empire, and changed the era name to Yangjia.

sentences.zh: 詔宗室絕屬籍者，一切復籍；

translations.literal: Decreed imperial clan severed from registers all restored to registers;
translations.idiomatic: It was decreed that all members of the imperial clan severed from the registers should be restored to the registers;

sentences.zh: 稟冀州尤貧民，勿收今年更、租、口賦。

translations.literal: Provide to Jizhou especially poor people, do not collect this year labor service, rents, poll taxes.
translations.idiomatic: Provide to the especially poor people of Jizhou, and do not collect this year's labor service, rents, or poll taxes.

sentences.zh: 夏五月戊寅，阜陵王恢薨。

translations.literal: Summer, fifth month, Wuyin day: Fuling King Hui passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wuyin day of the fifth month of summer, King Hui of Fuling passed away.

sentences.zh: 秋七月，史官始作候風地動銅儀。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month: Historiographers first made wind-observing earth-movement bronze instrument.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh month of autumn, the historiographers first made a bronze instrument for observing wind and earth movement.

sentences.zh: 丙辰，以太學新成，試明經下第者補弟子，增甲、乙科員各十人。

translations.literal: Bingchen day: Because the Imperial University was newly completed, tested those who failed the classics examination to supplement disciples, increased Jia and Yi category members by ten each.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingchen day, because the Imperial University was newly completed, those who failed the classics examination were tested to supplement the disciples, and members of the Jia and Yi categories were increased by ten each.

sentences.zh: 除郡國耆儒九十人補郎、舍人。

translations.literal: Appointed ninety eminent scholars from commanderies and kingdoms to supplement Gentlemen and Attendants-in-Attendance.
translations.idiomatic: Ninety eminent scholars from the commanderies and kingdoms were appointed to supplement the Gentlemen and Attendants-in-Attendance.

sentences.zh: 九月，詔郡國中都官繫囚皆減死一等，亡命者贖，各有差。

translations.literal: Ninth month: Decreed commanderies kingdoms capital officials imprisoned prisoners all reduce death penalty one rank, fugitives redeem, each graded.
translations.idiomatic: In the ninth month, it was decreed that prisoners held by capital officials in the commanderies and kingdoms should all have their death sentences reduced by one rank, and fugitives should redeem themselves, each graded accordingly.

sentences.zh: 鮮卑寇遼東。

translations.literal: Xianbei invaded Liaodong.
translations.idiomatic: The Xianbei invaded Liaodong.

sentences.zh: 冬十一月甲申，望都、蒲陰狼殺女子九十七人，詔賜狼所殺者錢，人三千。

translations.literal: Winter, eleventh month, Jiashen day: Wangdu, Puyin wolves killed ninety-seven women, decreed grant money to those killed by wolves, each person three thousand.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiashen day of the eleventh month of winter, wolves in Wangdu and Puyin killed ninety-seven women; it was decreed to grant money to those killed by wolves—three thousand cash each.

sentences.zh: 辛卯，初令郡國舉孝廉，限年四十以上，諸生通章句，文吏能箋奏，乃得應選；

translations.literal: Xinmao day: First commanded commanderies kingdoms recommend filial and incorrupt, limited age forty and above, various scholars proficient in chapters and sentences, literary officials able to write memorials, then able to respond to selection;
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinmao day, commanderies and kingdoms were first commanded to recommend the filial and incorrupt, limited to those forty years and above, scholars proficient in chapters and sentences, and literary officials able to write memorials, who would then be able to respond to selection;

sentences.zh: 其有茂才異行，若顏淵、子奇，不拘年齒。

translations.literal: Those who have outstanding talent exceptional conduct, like Yan Yuan, Ziqi, not constrained by age.
translations.idiomatic: Those who have outstanding talent and exceptional conduct, like Yan Yuan and Ziqi, are not constrained by age.

sentences.zh: 十二月丁未，東平王敞薨。

translations.literal: Twelfth month, Dingwei day: Dongping King Chang passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingwei day of the twelfth month, King Chang of Dongping passed away.

sentences.zh: 庚戌，復置玄菟郡屯田六部。

translations.literal: Gengxu day: Restored Xuanyu commandery agricultural garrisons six divisions.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengxu day, the agricultural garrisons of Xuanyu commandery were restored with six divisions.

sentences.zh: 閏月丁亥，令諸以詔除為郎，年四十以上課試如孝廉科者，得參廉選，歲舉一人。

translations.literal: Intercalary month Dinghai day: Commanded those appointed as Gentlemen by decree, age forty and above tested like xiaolian category, may participate in xiaolian selection, yearly recommend one person.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dinghai day of the intercalary month, it was commanded that those appointed as Gentlemen by decree, forty years and above and tested like the xiaolian category, may participate in xiaolian selection, with one person recommended yearly.

sentences.zh: 戊子，客星出天苑。

translations.literal: Wuzi day: Guest star appeared in Celestial Park.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wuzi day, a guest star appeared in Celestial Park.

sentences.zh: 辛卯，詔曰：『間者以來，吏政不勤，故灾咎屢臻，盜賊多有。

translations.literal: Xinmao day, decree said: 'In recent times, official administration not diligent, therefore calamities and misfortunes frequently arrive, bandits and robbers many have.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinmao day, a decree stated: 'In recent times, official administration has not been diligent; therefore calamities and misfortunes frequently arrive, and there are many bandits and robbers.

sentences.zh: 退省所由，皆以選舉不實，官非其人，是以天心未得，人情多怨。

translations.literal: Retire and examine the causes, all because selections not genuine, officials not the right people, therefore heavenly will not obtained, people's sentiments much resentment.
translations.idiomatic: Upon retiring and examining the causes, it is all because the selections are not genuine and officials are not the right people; therefore the heavenly will has not been obtained, and people's sentiments hold much resentment.

sentences.zh: 《書》歌股肱，《詩》刺三事。

translations.literal: The Shangshu praises the limbs and bones, the Shijing criticizes the three affairs.
translations.idiomatic: The Shangshu praises the limbs and bones; the Shijing criticizes the three affairs.

sentences.zh: 今刺史、二千石之選，歸任三司。

translations.literal: Now inspectors, two thousand shi selections, return responsibility to the three ministers.
translations.idiomatic: Now the selection of inspectors and two thousand shi officials returns responsibility to the three ministers.

sentences.zh: 其簡序先後，精覈高下，歲月之次，文武之宜，務存厥衷。』

translations.literal: Carefully sequence precedence, meticulously examine high and low, the order of years and months, the appropriateness of civil and military, diligently preserve their true intent.'
translations.idiomatic: Carefully sequence precedence; meticulously examine high and low; the order of years and months; the appropriateness of civil and military; diligently preserve their true intent.'

sentences.zh: 庚子，恭陵百丈廡灾。

translations.literal: Gengzi day: Gongling hundred-zhang corridor disaster.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengzi day, the hundred-zhang corridor of Gongling suffered a disaster.

sentences.zh: 是歲，起西苑，修飾宮殿。

translations.literal: This year: Raised the Western Park, decorated and repaired the palace halls.
translations.idiomatic: This year, the Western Park was raised, and the palace halls were decorated and repaired.

sentences.zh: 二年春二月甲申，詔以吳郡、會稽飢荒，貸人種糧。

translations.literal: Second year spring second month Jiashen day: Decreed because Wu commandery, Kuaiji famine and desolation, lend people seed grain.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiashen day of the second month of spring in the second year, it was decreed that because Wu commandery and Kuaiji had famine and desolation, seed grain should be lent to the people.

sentences.zh: 三月，使匈奴中郎將王稠率左骨都侯等擊鮮卑，破之。

translations.literal: Third month: Sent Xiongnu Colonel Wang Chou lead Left Bone Chief of the Xiongnu and others strike Xianbei, defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: In the third month, Xiongnu Colonel Wang Chou was sent to lead the Left Bone Chief of the Xiongnu and others to attack the Xianbei, and they defeated them.

sentences.zh: 辛酉，除京師耆儒年六十以上四十八人補郎、舍人及諸王國郎。

translations.literal: Xinyou day: Appointed capital eminent scholars age sixty and above forty-eight people supplement Gentlemen, Attendants-in-Attendance and various kingdoms Gentlemen.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinyou day, forty-eight eminent scholars from the capital, sixty years and above, were appointed to supplement the Gentlemen, Attendants-in-Attendance, and Gentlemen of various kingdoms.

sentences.zh: 夏四月，復置隴西南部都尉官。

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month: Restored Longxi southern regional commander official.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month of summer, the official position of southern regional commander of Longxi was restored.

sentences.zh: 己亥，京師地震。

translations.literal: Jihai day: Capital earthquake.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jihai day, there was an earthquake in the capital.

sentences.zh: 五月庚子，詔曰：『朕以不德，統奉鴻業，無以奉順乾坤，協序陰陽，灾眚屢見，咎徵仍臻。

translations.literal: Fifth month Gengzi day, decree said: 'I with lack of virtue, receive and uphold great enterprise, have not been able to respectfully follow heaven and earth, harmonize the sequence of yin and yang, calamities frequently seen, ominous signs still arrive.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengzi day of the fifth month, a decree stated: 'I, with my lack of virtue, receive and uphold this great enterprise; I have not been able to respectfully follow heaven and earth, harmonize the sequence of yin and yang; calamities are frequently seen, and ominous signs still arrive.

sentences.zh: 地動之異，發自京師，矜矜祗畏，不知所裁。

translations.literal: Earth movement anomaly, originated from capital, apprehensive and reverent, do not know what to do.
translations.idiomatic: The anomaly of earth movement originated from the capital; I am apprehensive and reverent, and do not know what to do.

sentences.zh: 羣公卿士將何以匡輔不逮，奉荅戒異？

translations.literal: All dukes ministers scholars how to correct and assist shortcomings, respectfully answer and heed the warning anomaly?
translations.idiomatic: How will all the dukes, ministers, and scholars correct and assist my shortcomings, and respectfully answer and heed this warning anomaly?

sentences.zh: 異不空設，必有所應，其各悉心直言厥咎，靡有所諱。』

translations.literal: Anomalies not established in vain, must have something they respond to, each with whole heart directly speak their faults, nothing to be concealed.'
translations.idiomatic: Anomalies are not established in vain; they must respond to something. Each of you should with whole heart directly speak of the faults, concealing nothing.'

sentences.zh: 戊午，司空王龔免。

translations.literal: Wuwu day: Minister of Works Wang Gong dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wuwu day, Minister of Works Wang Gong was dismissed.

sentences.zh: 六月辛未，太常魯國孔扶為司空。

translations.literal: Sixth month Xinwei day: Grand Minister of Ceremonies Kong Fu of Lu kingdom became Minister of Works.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinwei day of the sixth month, Grand Minister of Ceremonies Kong Fu of Lu kingdom became Minister of Works.

sentences.zh: 疏勒國獻師子、封牛。

translations.literal: Shule kingdom presented lion, sealed ox.
translations.idiomatic: The Shule kingdom presented a lion and a sealed ox.

sentences.zh: 丁丑，洛陽地陷。

translations.literal: Dingchou day: Luoyang ground sank.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingchou day, the ground sank in Luoyang.

sentences.zh: 是月，旱。

translations.literal: This month: Drought.
translations.idiomatic: There was drought this month.

sentences.zh: 秋七月己未，太尉龐參免。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month, Jiwei day: Grand Marshal Pang Shen dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiwei day of the seventh month of autumn, Grand Marshal Pang Shen was dismissed.

sentences.zh: 八月己巳，大鴻臚沛國施延為太尉。

translations.literal: Eighth month, Jisi day: Grand Herald Shi Yan of Pei kingdom became Grand Marshal.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jisi day of the eighth month, Grand Herald Shi Yan of Pei kingdom became Grand Marshal.

sentences.zh: 鮮卑寇代郡。

translations.literal: Xianbei invaded Dai commandery.
translations.idiomatic: The Xianbei invaded Dai commandery.

sentences.zh: 冬十月庚午，行禮辟雍，奏應鐘，始復黃鐘，作樂器隨月律。

translations.literal: Winter, tenth month, Gengwu day: Performed rites at the Biyong, played Yingzhong, first restored Huangzhong, made musical instruments follow monthly pitches.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengwu day of the tenth month of winter, rites were performed at the Biyong, Yingzhong was played, Huangzhong was first restored, and musical instruments were made to follow the monthly pitches.

sentences.zh: 三年春二月己丑，詔以久旱，京師諸獄無輕重皆且勿考竟，須得澍雨。

translations.literal: Third year spring second month Jichou day: Decreed because prolonged drought, capital various prisons regardless of light heavy all for now do not examine to conclusion, must await timely rain.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jichou day of the second month of spring in the third year, it was decreed that because of the prolonged drought, all cases in the various prisons of the capital, regardless of severity, should for now not be examined to conclusion, and must await timely rain.

sentences.zh: 三月庚戌，益州盜賊劫質令長，殺列侯。

translations.literal: Third month Gengxu day: Yizhou bandit robbers kidnapped and held magistrates as hostages, killed marquises.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengxu day of the third month, bandit robbers in Yizhou kidnapped magistrates as hostages and killed marquises.

sentences.zh: 夏四月丙寅，車師後部司馬率後部王加特奴等掩擊匈奴，大破之，獲其季母。

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month, Bingyin day: Cheshi rear division Colonel led rear division King Jia Te Nu and others surprise attacked Xiongnu, greatly defeated them, captured their youngest maternal aunt.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingyin day of the fourth month of summer, Cheshi rear division Colonel led rear division King Jia Te Nu and others in a surprise attack on the Xiongnu, greatly defeating them and capturing their youngest maternal aunt.

sentences.zh: 五月戊戌，制詔曰：『昔我太宗，丕顯之德，假於上下，儉以恤民，政致康乂。

translations.literal: Fifth month Wuxu day, imperial decree said: 'Formerly Our Supreme Ancestor, his greatly manifest virtue, extended to superiors and inferiors, frugal to relieve the people, governance achieved peace and prosperity.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wuxu day of the fifth month, an imperial decree stated: 'Formerly Our Supreme Ancestor possessed greatly manifest virtue that extended to superiors and inferiors; he was frugal to relieve the people, and his governance achieved peace and prosperity.

sentences.zh: 朕秉事不明，政失厥道，天地譴怒，大變仍見。

translations.literal: I conduct affairs unclearly, governance lost its way, heaven and earth rebuke angrily, great changes still appear.
translations.idiomatic: I conduct affairs unclearly; governance has lost its way; heaven and earth rebuke angrily, and great changes still appear.

sentences.zh: 春夏連旱，寇賊彌繁，元元被害，朕甚愍之。

translations.literal: Spring summer continuous drought, bandits and robbers increasingly numerous, the common people harmed, I greatly pity them.
translations.idiomatic: Spring and summer have had continuous drought; bandits and robbers are increasingly numerous; the common people are harmed, and I greatly pity them.

sentences.zh: 嘉與海內洗心更始。

translations.literal: Good fortune with the seas within wash hearts and make fresh starts.
translations.idiomatic: May good fortune be with those within the seas who wash their hearts and make fresh starts.

sentences.zh: 其大赦天下，自殊死以下謀反大逆諸犯不當得赦者，皆赦除之。

translations.literal: Grant general amnesty to the empire, from death penalty down plotting rebellion great inversion various crimes not proper to receive amnesty, all pardon and remove them.
translations.idiomatic: Grant a general amnesty to the empire; from the death penalty down, all those guilty of plotting rebellion and great inversion who are not proper to receive amnesty shall all be pardoned and removed.

sentences.zh: 賜民年八十以上米，人一斛，肉二十斤，酒五斗；

translations.literal: Granted common people age eighty and above grain, each person one bushel, meat twenty catties, wine five dou;
translations.idiomatic: Common people eighty years and above were granted grain—one bushel each; meat—twenty catties; wine—five dou;

sentences.zh: 九十以上加賜帛，人二匹，絮三斤。』

translations.literal: Ninety and above additionally granted silk, each person two bolts, cotton wadding three catties.'
translations.idiomatic: Those ninety and above were additionally granted silk—two bolts each; cotton wadding—three catties.'

sentences.zh: 秋七月庚戌，鐘羌寇隴西、漢陽。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month, Gengxu day: Zhong Qiang invaded Longxi, Hanyang.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengxu day of the seventh month of autumn, the Zhong Qiang invaded Longxi and Hanyang.

sentences.zh: 冬十月，護羌校尉馬續擊破之。

translations.literal: Winter, tenth month: Protector of Qiang Colonel Ma Xu struck and defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: In the tenth month of winter, Protector of Qiang Colonel Ma Xu attacked and defeated them.

sentences.zh: 十一月壬寅，司徒劉崎、司空孔扶免。

translations.literal: Eleventh month Renyin day: Minister of the Masses Liu Qi, Minister of Works Kong Fu dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Renyin day of the eleventh month, Minister of the Masses Liu Qi and Minister of Works Kong Fu were dismissed.

sentences.zh: 乙巳，大司農南郡黃尚為司徒，光祿勳河東王卓為司空。

translations.literal: Yisi day: Grand Minister of Agriculture Huang Shang of Nanhun became Minister of the Masses, Superintendent of Ceremonials Wang Zhuo of Hedong became Minister of Works.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yisi day, Grand Minister of Agriculture Huang Shang of Nanhun became Minister of the Masses, and Superintendent of Ceremonials Wang Zhuo of Hedong became Minister of Works.

sentences.zh: 丙午，武都塞上屯羌及外羌攻破屯官，驅略人畜。

translations.literal: Bingwu day: Wudu frontier garrison Qiang and outer Qiang attacked and broke garrison officials, drove off and seized people and livestock.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingwu day, the garrison Qiang on the Wudu frontier and outer Qiang attacked and broke the garrison officials, driving off and seizing people and livestock.

sentences.zh: 四年春二月丙子，初聽中官得以養子為後，世襲封爵。

translations.literal: Fourth year spring second month Bingzi day: First permitted eunuchs to take adopted sons as heirs, hereditary enfeoffed nobility.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingzi day of the second month of spring in the fourth year, eunuchs were first permitted to take adopted sons as heirs with hereditary enfeoffed nobility.

sentences.zh: 自去冬旱，至於是月。

translations.literal: From last winter drought, until this month.
translations.idiomatic: From the drought of last winter until this month.

sentences.zh: 謁者馬賢擊鐘羌，大破之。

translations.literal: Attendant Ma Xian struck Zhong Qiang, greatly defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: Attendant Ma Xian attacked the Zhong Qiang and greatly defeated them.

sentences.zh: 夏四月甲子，太尉施延免。

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month, Jiazi day: Grand Marshal Shi Yan dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiazi day of the fourth month of summer, Grand Marshal Shi Yan was dismissed.

sentences.zh: 戊寅，執金吾梁商為大將軍，前太尉龐參為太尉。

translations.literal: Wuyin day: Commander of the Guards Liang Shang became Grand General, former Grand Marshal Pang Shen became Grand Marshal.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wuyin day, Commander of the Guards Liang Shang became Grand General, and former Grand Marshal Pang Shen became Grand Marshal.

sentences.zh: 六月己未，梁王匡薨。

translations.literal: Sixth month Jiwei day: Liang King Kuang passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiwei day of the sixth month, King Kuang of Liang passed away.

sentences.zh: 秋七月己亥，濟北王登薨。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month, Jihai day: Jibei King Deng passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jihai day of the seventh month of autumn, King Deng of Jibei passed away.

sentences.zh: 閏月丁亥朔，日有食之。

translations.literal: Intercalary month Dinghai first day: There was a solar eclipse.
translations.idiomatic: On the first day of the intercalary month (Dinghai), there was a solar eclipse.

sentences.zh: 冬十月，烏桓寇雲中。

translations.literal: Winter, tenth month: Wuhuan invaded Yunzhong.
translations.idiomatic: In the tenth month of winter, the Wuhuan invaded Yunzhong.

sentences.zh: 十一月，圍度遼將軍耿曄於蘭池，發諸郡兵救之，烏桓退走。

translations.literal: Eleventh month: Surrounded General Crossing Liao Geng Ye at Lanchi, dispatched various commandery troops to rescue him, Wuhuan retreated and fled.
translations.idiomatic: In the eleventh month, General Crossing Liao Geng Ye was surrounded at Lanchi; troops from various commanderies were dispatched to rescue him, and the Wuhuan retreated and fled.

sentences.zh: 十二月甲寅，京師地震。

translations.literal: Twelfth month JiaYin day: Capital earthquake.
translations.idiomatic: On the JiaYin day of the twelfth month, there was an earthquake in the capital.

sentences.zh: 永和元年春正月，夫餘王來朝。

translations.literal: Yonghe first year spring first month: Fuyu king came to court.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month of spring of the first year of Yonghe, the king of Fuyu came to court.

sentences.zh: 乙卯，詔曰：『朕秉政不明，灾眚屢臻。

translations.literal: Yimao day, decree said: 'I conduct government unclearly, calamities frequently arrive.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yimao day, a decree stated: 'I conduct government unclearly; calamities frequently arrive.

sentences.zh: 典籍所忌，震食為重。

translations.literal: What the classics dread, earthquakes eclipses are grave.
translations.idiomatic: What the classics dread are earthquakes and eclipses, which are grave matters.

sentences.zh: 今日變方遠，地搖京師，咎徵不虛，必有所應。

translations.literal: Today's anomaly is far-reaching, earth shakes capital, ominous signs not false, must have something they respond to.
translations.idiomatic: Today's anomaly is far-reaching; the earth shakes in the capital; ominous signs are not false and must respond to something.

sentences.zh: 群公百僚其各上封事，指陳得失，靡有所諱。』

translations.literal: All dukes officials each submit sealed memorials, point out and state gains losses, nothing to be concealed.'
translations.idiomatic: All dukes and officials should each submit sealed memorials pointing out and stating gains and losses, concealing nothing.'

sentences.zh: 己巳，宗祀明堂，登靈臺，改元永和，大赦天下。

translations.literal: Jisi day: Ancestral sacrifice at Bright Hall, ascended Spirit Terrace, changed era name to Yonghe, granted general amnesty to the empire.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jisi day, ancestral sacrifice was performed at the Bright Hall, the Spirit Terrace was ascended, the era name was changed to Yonghe, and a general amnesty was granted to the empire.

sentences.zh: 秋七月，偃師蝗。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month: Yanshi locusts.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh month of autumn, there were locusts in Yanshi.

sentences.zh: 冬十月丁亥，承福殿火，帝避御雲臺。

translations.literal: Winter, tenth month, Dinghai day: Chengfu Hall fire, the Emperor avoided the Cloud Terrace.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dinghai day of the tenth month of winter, Chengfu Hall caught fire, and the Emperor took refuge at the Cloud Terrace.

sentences.zh: 十一月丙子，太尉龐參罷。

translations.literal: Eleventh month Bingzi day: Grand Marshal Pang Shen dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingzi day of the eleventh month, Grand Marshal Pang Shen was dismissed.

sentences.zh: 十二月，象林蠻夷叛。

translations.literal: Twelfth month: Xianglin barbarian tribes rebelled.
translations.idiomatic: In the twelfth month, the barbarian tribes of Xianglin rebelled.

sentences.zh: 乙巳，以前司空王龔為太尉。

translations.literal: Yisi day: Made former Minister of Works Wang Gong Grand Marshal.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yisi day, former Minister of Works Wang Gong was made Grand Marshal.

sentences.zh: 二年春正月，武陵蠻叛，圍充縣，又寇夷道。

translations.literal: Second year spring first month: Wuling barbarians rebelled, surrounded Chong county, also invaded Yidao.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month of spring of the second year, the Wuling barbarians rebelled, surrounded Chong county, and also invaded Yidao.

sentences.zh: 二月，廣漢屬國都尉擊破白馬羌。

translations.literal: Second month: Guanghan Dependent States Colonel struck and defeated White Horse Qiang.
translations.idiomatic: In the second month, the Guanghan Dependent States Colonel attacked and defeated the White Horse Qiang.

sentences.zh: 武陵太守李進擊叛蠻，破之。

translations.literal: Wuling Governor Li Jin struck rebel barbarians, defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: Wuling Governor Li Jin attacked the rebel barbarians and defeated them.

sentences.zh: 三月辛亥，北海王翼薨。

translations.literal: Third month Xinhai day: Beihai King Yi passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinhai day of the third month, King Yi of Beihai passed away.

sentences.zh: 乙卯，司空王卓薨。

translations.literal: Yimao day: Minister of Works Wang Zhuo passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yimao day, Minister of Works Wang Zhuo passed away.

sentences.zh: 丁丑，光祿勳馮翊郭虔為司空。

translations.literal: Dingchou day: Superintendent of Ceremonials Guo Qian of Fufeng became Minister of Works.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingchou day, Superintendent of Ceremonials Guo Qian of Fufeng became Minister of Works.

sentences.zh: 夏四月丙申，京師地震。

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month, Bingchen day: Capital earthquake.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingchen day of the fourth month of summer, there was an earthquake in the capital.

sentences.zh: 五月，日南叛蠻攻郡府。

translations.literal: Fifth month: Rinan rebel barbarians attacked the commandery offices.
translations.idiomatic: In the fifth month, the rebel barbarians of Rinan attacked the commandery offices.

sentences.zh: 秋七月，九真、交阯二郡兵反。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month: Jiuzhen, Jiaozhi two commandery troops rebelled.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh month of autumn, the troops of the two commanderies Jiuzhen and Jiaozhi rebelled.

sentences.zh: 八月庚子，熒惑犯南斗。

translations.literal: Eighth month Gengzi day: Mars offended Southern Dipper.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengzi day of the eighth month, Mars offended the Southern Dipper.

sentences.zh: 江夏盜賊殺邾長。

translations.literal: Jiangxia bandit robbers killed Zhu magistrate.
translations.idiomatic: The bandit robbers of Jiangxia killed the Zhu magistrate.

sentences.zh: 冬十月甲申，行幸長安，所過鰥、寡、孤、獨、貧不能自存者賜粟，人五斛。

translations.literal: Winter, tenth month, Jiashen day: Imperial progress to Chang'an, those passed widowers, widows, orphans, solitaries, poor unable to support themselves granted grain, each person five bushels.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiashen day of the tenth month of winter, the Emperor made a progress to Chang'an; those passed—widowers, widows, orphans, solitaries, and the poor unable to support themselves—were granted grain, five bushels each.

sentences.zh: 庚子，幸未央宮，會三輔郡守、都尉及官屬，勞賜作樂。

translations.literal: Gengzi day: Visited Weiyang Palace, assembled Sanfu commandery governors, colonels and officials, rewarded and made music.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengzi day, he visited Weiyang Palace, assembled the governors and colonels of the Sanfu commanderies and their officials, rewarded them, and made music.

sentences.zh: 十一月丙午，祠高廟。

translations.literal: Eleventh month Bingwu day: Sacrificed at Gao Temple.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingwu day of the eleventh month, he sacrificed at the Gao Temple.

sentences.zh: 丁未，遂有事十一陵。

translations.literal: Dingwei day: Then had affairs at the eleven mausoleums.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingwei day, he then performed rites at the eleven mausoleums.

sentences.zh: 丁卯，京師地震。

translations.literal: Dingmao day: Capital earthquake.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingmao day, there was an earthquake in the capital.

sentences.zh: 十二月乙亥，至自長安。

translations.literal: Twelfth month Yihai day: Arrived from Chang'an.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yihai day of the twelfth month, he arrived from Chang'an.

sentences.zh: 三年春二月乙亥，京師及金城、隴西地震，二郡山岸崩，地陷。

translations.literal: Third year spring second month Yihai day: Capital and Jincheng, Longxi earthquake, two commanderies mountain banks collapsed, ground sank.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yihai day of the second month of spring in the third year, there was an earthquake in the capital and Jincheng and Longxi commanderies; the mountain banks in the two commanderies collapsed and the ground sank.

sentences.zh: 戊子，太白犯熒惑。

translations.literal: Wuzi day: Venus offended Mars.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wuzi day, Venus offended Mars.

sentences.zh: 夏四月，九江賊蔡伯流寇郡界，及廣陵，殺江都長。

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month: Jiujiang bandit Cai Bo flowed into invaded commandery borders, reached Guangling, killed Jiangdu magistrate.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month of summer, the Jiujiang bandit Cai Bo invaded the commandery borders, reached Guangling, and killed the Jiangdu magistrate.

sentences.zh: 戊戌，遣光祿大夫案行金城、隴西，賜壓死者年七歲以上錢，人二千；

translations.literal: Wuxu day: Dispatched Superintendent of Ceremonials to inspect Jincheng, Longxi, granted money to those crushed to death aged seven and above, each person two thousand;
translations.idiomatic: On the Wuxu day, Superintendents of Ceremonials were dispatched to inspect Jincheng and Longxi, and money was granted to those crushed to death aged seven and above—two thousand cash each;

sentences.zh: 一家皆被害，為收斂之。

translations.literal: Entire family all harmed, provided burial for them.
translations.idiomatic: Entire families were harmed, and burial was provided for them.

sentences.zh: 除今年田租，尤甚者勿收口賦。

translations.literal: Remitted this year field rents, especially severe ones do not collect poll taxes.
translations.idiomatic: This year's field rents were remitted, and poll taxes were not collected in especially severe cases.

sentences.zh: 秋七月丙戌，濟北王多薨。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month, Bingxu day: Jibei King Duo passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingxu day of the seventh month of autumn, King Duo of Jibei passed away.

sentences.zh: 八月己未，司徒黃尚免。

translations.literal: Eighth month Jiwei day: Minister of the Masses Huang Shang dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiwei day of the eighth month, Minister of the Masses Huang Shang was dismissed.

sentences.zh: 九月己酉，光祿勳長沙劉壽為司徒。

translations.literal: Ninth month Jiyou day: Superintendent of Ceremonials Liu Shou of Changsha became Minister of the Masses.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiyou day of the ninth month, Superintendent of Ceremonials Liu Shou of Changsha became Minister of the Masses.

sentences.zh: 丙戌，令大將軍、三公各舉故刺史、二千石及見令、長、郎、謁者、四府掾屬剛毅武猛有謀謨任將帥者各二人，特進、卿、校尉各一人。

translations.literal: Bingxu day: Commanded Grand General, Three Dukes each recommend former inspectors, two thousand shi and current magistrates, chiefs, Gentlemen, Attendants, four offices subordinates resolute firm martial fierce with strategies fit for generals each two persons, Specially Advanced, Ministers, Colonels each one person.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingxu day, the Grand General and Three Dukes were commanded to each recommend former inspectors and two thousand shi officials, as well as current magistrates, chiefs, Gentlemen, and Attendants from the four offices' subordinates who were resolute, firm, martial, and fierce with strategies fit for generals—two persons each; and Specially Advanced officials, Ministers, and Colonels—one person each.

sentences.zh: 冬十月，燒當羌寇金城，護羌校尉馬賢擊破之，羌遂相招而叛。

translations.literal: Winter, tenth month: Shandang Qiang invaded Jincheng, Protector of Qiang Colonel Ma Xian struck and defeated them, Qiang then mutually summoned and rebelled.
translations.idiomatic: In the tenth month of winter, the Shandang Qiang invaded Jincheng; Protector of Qiang Colonel Ma Xian attacked and defeated them, and the Qiang then mutually summoned each other and rebelled.

sentences.zh: 十二月戊戌朔，日有食之。

translations.literal: Twelfth month Wuxu first day: There was a solar eclipse.
translations.idiomatic: On the first day of the twelfth month (Wuxu), there was a solar eclipse.

sentences.zh: 四年春正月庚辰，中常侍張逵、蘧政、楊定等有罪誅，連及弘農太守張鳳、安平相楊告，下獄死。

translations.literal: Fourth year spring first month Gengchen day: Palace Attendants Zhang Kui, Qu Zheng, Yang Ding and others had crimes executed, implicated Hongnong Governor Zhang Feng, Anping Chancellor Yang Gao, imprisoned and died.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengchen day of the first month of spring in the fourth year, Palace Attendants Zhang Kui, Qu Zheng, Yang Ding and others were executed for crimes; this implicated Hongnong Governor Zhang Feng and Anping Chancellor Yang Gao, who were imprisoned and died.

sentences.zh: 三月乙亥，京師地震。

translations.literal: Third month Yihai day: Capital earthquake.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yihai day of the third month, there was an earthquake in the capital.

sentences.zh: 夏四月癸卯，護羌校尉馬賢討燒當羌，大破之。

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month, GuiMao day: Protector of Qiang Colonel Ma Xian attacked Shandang Qiang, greatly defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: On the GuiMao day of the fourth month of summer, Protector of Qiang Colonel Ma Xian attacked the Shandang Qiang and greatly defeated them.

sentences.zh: 戊午，大赦天下。

translations.literal: Wuwu day: Granted general amnesty to the empire.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wuwu day, a general amnesty was granted to the empire.

sentences.zh: 賜民爵及粟、帛各有差。

translations.literal: Granted common people nobility ranks and grain, silk each graded.
translations.idiomatic: Common people were granted nobility ranks and grain and silk, each graded accordingly.

sentences.zh: 五月戊辰，封故濟北惠王壽子安為濟北王。

translations.literal: Fifth month Wuchen day: Enfeoffed former Jibei Hui King Shou's son An as Jibei King.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wuchen day of the fifth month, the former King Shou of Jibei's son An was enfeoffed as King of Jibei.

sentences.zh: 秋八月，太原郡旱，民庶流冗。

translations.literal: Autumn, eighth month: Taiyuan commandery drought, common people displaced and wandering.
translations.idiomatic: In the eighth month of autumn, there was drought in Taiyuan commandery, and the common people were displaced and wandering.

sentences.zh: 癸丑，遣光祿大夫案行稟貸，除更賦。

translations.literal: GuiChou day: Dispatched Superintendent of Ceremonials to inspect and tour provide loans, remitted labor service taxes.
translations.idiomatic: On the GuiChou day, Superintendents of Ceremonials were dispatched to inspect and tour, provide loans, and remit labor service taxes.

sentences.zh: 冬十月戊午，校獵上林苑，歷函谷關而還。

translations.literal: Winter, tenth month, Wuwu day: Hunted at Shanglin Park, passed through Hangu Pass and returned.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wuwu day of the tenth month of winter, he hunted at Shanglin Park, passed through Hangu Pass, and returned.

sentences.zh: 十一月丙寅，幸廣成苑。

translations.literal: Eleventh month Bingyin day: Visited Guangcheng Park.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingyin day of the eleventh month, he visited Guangcheng Park.

sentences.zh: 五年春二月戊申，京師地震。

translations.literal: Fifth year spring second month Wushen day: Capital earthquake.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wushen day of the second month of spring in the fifth year, there was an earthquake in the capital.

sentences.zh: 夏四月庚子，中山王弘薨。

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month, Gengzi day: Zhongshan King Hong passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengzi day of the fourth month of summer, King Hong of Zhongshan passed away.

sentences.zh: 南匈奴左部句龍大人吾斯、車紐等叛，圍美稷。

translations.literal: Southern Xiongnu left division Julong chief Wu Si, Che Niu and others rebelled, surrounded Meiji.
translations.idiomatic: The Southern Xiongnu left division chiefs Wu Si and Che Niu and others rebelled and surrounded Meiji.

sentences.zh: 五月，度遼將軍馬續討吾斯、車紐，破之，使匈奴中郎將陳龜迫殺南單于。

translations.literal: Fifth month: General Crossing Liao Ma Xu attacked Wu Si, Che Niu, defeated them, sent Xiongnu Colonel Chen Gui to force kill Southern Chanyu.
translations.idiomatic: In the fifth month, General Crossing Liao Ma Xu attacked Wu Si and Che Niu, defeated them, and sent Xiongnu Colonel Chen Gui to force the killing of the Southern Chanyu.

sentences.zh: 己亚晦，日有食之。

translations.literal: Ji last day of month: There was a solar eclipse.
translations.idiomatic: On the last day of the month (Ji), there was a solar eclipse.

sentences.zh: 且凍羌寇三輔，殺令長。

translations.literal: Qiedong Qiang invaded Sanfu, killed magistrates.
translations.idiomatic: The Qiedong Qiang invaded the Sanfu region and killed magistrates.

sentences.zh: 丁丑，令死罪以下及亡命贖，各有差。

translations.literal: Dingchou day: Commanded death penalty and below and fugitives redeem, each graded.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingchou day, it was commanded that those with death penalty and below, and fugitives, should redeem themselves, each graded accordingly.

sentences.zh: 九月，令扶風、漢陽築隴道塢三百所，置屯兵。

translations.literal: Ninth month: Commanded Fufeng, Hanyang build Long Road fortifications three hundred places, placed garrison troops.
translations.idiomatic: In the ninth month, Fufeng and Hanyang were commanded to build three hundred fortifications along the Long Road and place garrison troops there.

sentences.zh: 辛未，太尉王龔罷。

translations.literal: Xinwei day: Grand Marshal Wang Gong dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinwei day, Grand Marshal Wang Gong was dismissed.

sentences.zh: 且凍羌寇武都，燒隴關。

translations.literal: Qiedong Qiang invaded Wudu, burned Long Pass.
translations.idiomatic: The Qiedong Qiang invaded Wudu and burned Long Pass.

sentences.zh: 壬午，太常桓焉為太尉。

translations.literal: Renwu day: Grand Minister of Ceremonies Huan Yan became Grand Marshal.
translations.idiomatic: On the Renwu day, Grand Minister of Ceremonies Huan Yan became Grand Marshal.

sentences.zh: 丁亥，徙西河郡居離石，上郡居夏陽，朔方居五原。

translations.literal: Dinghai day: Moved Xibe commandery to reside at Lishi, Shang commandery to reside at Xiayang, Shuofang to reside at Wuyuan.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dinghai day, Xibe commandery was moved to reside at Lishi, Shang commandery to reside at Xiayang, and Shuofang to reside at Wuyuan.

sentences.zh: 句龍吾斯等東引烏桓，西收羌胡，寇上郡，立車紐為單于。

translations.literal: Julong Wu Si and others east drew Wuhuan, west gathered Qiang Hu, invaded Shang commandery, established Che Niu as Chanyu.
translations.idiomatic: Julong Wu Si and others drew the Wuhuan from the east and gathered the Qiang and Hu from the west; they invaded Shang commandery and established Che Niu as Chanyu.

sentences.zh: 冬十一月辛巳，遣使匈奴中郎將張耽擊破之，車紐降。

translations.literal: Winter, eleventh month, Xinsi day: Dispatched Xiongnu Colonel Zhang Dan struck and defeated them, Che Niu surrendered.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinsi day of the eleventh month of winter, Xiongnu Colonel Zhang Dan was dispatched and attacked and defeated them; Che Niu surrendered.

sentences.zh: 六年春正月丙子，征西將軍馬賢與且凍羌戰於射姑山，賢軍敗沒，安定太守郭璜下獄死。

translations.literal: Sixth year spring first month Bingzi day: General Campaigning West Ma Xian battled Qiedong Qiang at Shegu Mountain, Xian's army defeated and annihilated, Anding Governor Guo Zhang imprisoned and died.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingzi day of the first month of spring in the sixth year, General Campaigning West Ma Xian battled the Qiedong Qiang at Shegu Mountain; Xian's army was defeated and annihilated, and Anding Governor Guo Zhang was imprisoned and died.

sentences.zh: 詔貸王、侯國租一歲。

translations.literal: Decreed lent kings, marquises kingdoms rents one year.
translations.idiomatic: It was decreed that the rents of kings and marquises' kingdoms be lent for one year.

sentences.zh: 閏月，鞏唐羌寇隴西，遂及三輔。

translations.literal: Intercalary month: Gongtang Qiang invaded Longxi, then reached Sanfu.
translations.idiomatic: In the intercalary month, the Gongtang Qiang invaded Longxi and then reached the Sanfu region.

sentences.zh: 二月丁巳，有星孛於營室。

translations.literal: Second month Dingsi day: There was a comet in Encampment Chamber.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingsi day of the second month, there was a comet in Encampment Chamber.

sentences.zh: 秋七月甲午，詔假民有貲者戶錢一千。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month, Jiawu day: Decreed loaned common people with property households one thousand cash.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiawu day of the seventh month of autumn, it was decreed that households of common people with property be loaned one thousand cash.

sentences.zh: 八月丙辰，大將軍梁商薨；

translations.literal: Eighth month Bingchen day: Grand General Liang Shang passed away;
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingchen day of the eighth month, Grand General Liang Shang passed away;
