sentences.zh: 壬戌，河南尹梁冀為大將軍。

translations.literal: Renxu day: Henan Governor Liang Ji became Grand General.
translations.idiomatic: On the Renxu day, Henan Governor Liang Ji became Grand General.

sentences.zh: 九月，諸種羌寇武威。

translations.literal: Ninth month: Various Qiang tribes invaded Wuwei.
translations.idiomatic: In the ninth month, the various Qiang tribes invaded Wuwei.

sentences.zh: 辛亥晦，日有食之。

translations.literal: Xinhai last day: There was a solar eclipse.
translations.idiomatic: On the last day (Xinhai), there was a solar eclipse.

sentences.zh: 冬十月癸丑，徙安定居扶風，北地居馮翔。

translations.literal: Winter, tenth month, GuiChou day: Moved Anding to reside in Fufeng, Beidi to reside in Fengxiang.
translations.idiomatic: On the GuiChou day of the tenth month of winter, Anding was moved to reside in Fufeng, and Beidi was moved to reside in Fengxiang.

sentences.zh: 十一月庚子，以執金吾張喬行車騎將軍事，將兵屯三輔。

translations.literal: Eleventh month Gengzi day: Made Commander of the Guards Zhang Qiao act as Chariot Cavalry General, lead troops to garrison Sanfu.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengzi day of the eleventh month, Commander of the Guards Zhang Qiao was made to act as Chariot Cavalry General and lead troops to garrison the Sanfu region.

sentences.zh: 漢安元年春正月癸巳，宗祀明堂，大赦天下，改元漢安。

translations.literal: Han'an first year spring first month Guisi day: Ancestral sacrifice at Bright Hall, granted general amnesty to the empire, changed era name to Han'an.
translations.idiomatic: On the Guisi day of the first month of spring in the first year of Han'an, ancestral sacrifice was performed at the Bright Hall, a general amnesty was granted to the empire, and the era name was changed to Han'an.

sentences.zh: 二月丙辰，詔大將軍、公、卿舉賢良方正、能探賾索隱者各一人。

translations.literal: Second month Bingchen day: Decreed Grand General, Dukes, Ministers recommend worthy and upright, able to investigate corruption and seek hidden things each one person.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingchen day of the second month, the Grand General, Dukes, and Ministers were decreed to recommend the worthy and upright, those able to investigate corruption and seek hidden things—one person each.

sentences.zh: 秋七月，始置承華廄。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month: First established Chenghua stable.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh month of autumn, the Chenghua stable was first established.

sentences.zh: 八月，南匈奴左部大人句龍吾斯與薁鞬臺耆等反叛。

translations.literal: Eighth month: Southern Xiongnu left division chief Julong Wu Si and Yujian Taizhi and others rebelled.
translations.idiomatic: In the eighth month, Southern Xiongnu left division chief Julong Wu Si and Yujian Taizhi and others rebelled.

sentences.zh: 丁卯，遣侍中杜喬，光祿大夫周舉，守光祿大夫郭遵、馮羨、欒巴、張綱、周栩、劉班等八人分行州、郡，班宣風化，舉實臧否。

translations.literal: Dingmao day: Dispatched Attendant-in-Attendance Du Qiao, Superintendent of Ceremonials Zhou Ju, Acting Superintendents of Ceremonials Guo Zun, Feng Xian, Luan Ba, Zhang Gang, Zhou Xu, Liu Ban and others eight people separately tour provinces, commanderies, proclaim and promulgate moral transformation, recommend genuine good and bad.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingmao day, Attendant-in-Attendance Du Qiao, Superintendent of Ceremonials Zhou Ju, Acting Superintendents of Ceremonials Guo Zun, Feng Xian, Luan Ba, Zhang Gang, Zhou Xu, Liu Ban and eight others were dispatched to separately tour the provinces and commanderies, proclaim and promulgate moral transformation, and recommend genuine good and bad.

sentences.zh: 九月庚寅，廣陵盜賊張嬰等寇郡縣。

translations.literal: Ninth month Gengyin day: Guangling bandit robbers Zhang Ying and others invaded commanderies and counties.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengyin day of the ninth month, Guangling bandit robbers Zhang Ying and others invaded the commanderies and counties.

sentences.zh: 冬十月辛未，太尉桓焉、司徒劉壽免。

translations.literal: Winter, tenth month, Xinwei day: Grand Marshal Huan Yan, Minister of the Masses Liu Shou dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinwei day of the tenth month of winter, Grand Marshal Huan Yan and Minister of the Masses Liu Shou were dismissed.

sentences.zh: 甲戌，行車騎將軍張喬罷。

translations.literal: Jiaxu day: Acting Chariot Cavalry General Zhang Qiao dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiaxu day, Acting Chariot Cavalry General Zhang Qiao was dismissed.

sentences.zh: 十一月壬午，司隸校尉趙峻為太尉，大司農胡廣為司徒。

translations.literal: Eleventh month Renwu day: Capital Area Colonel Zhao Jun became Grand Marshal, Grand Minister of Agriculture Hu Guang became Minister of the Masses.
translations.idiomatic: On the Renwu day of the eleventh month, Capital Area Colonel Zhao Jun became Grand Marshal, and Grand Minister of Agriculture Hu Guang became Minister of the Masses.

sentences.zh: 癸卯，詔大將軍、三公選武猛試用有效驗任為將校者各一人。

translations.literal: GuiMao day: Decreed Grand General, Three Dukes select martial fierce tested used effective verified fit as generals officers each one person.
translations.idiomatic: On the GuiMao day, the Grand General and Three Dukes were decreed to select the martial and fierce, those tested and used with effective verification fit to be generals and officers—one person each.

sentences.zh: 是歲，廣陵賊張嬰等詣太守張綱降。

translations.literal: This year: Guangling bandit Zhang Ying and others went to Governor Zhang Gang to surrender.
translations.idiomatic: This year, Guangling bandit Zhang Ying and others went to Governor Zhang Gang to surrender.

sentences.zh: 二年春二月丙辰，鄯善國遣使貢獻。

translations.literal: Second year spring second month Bingchen day: Shanshan kingdom dispatched envoys to present tribute.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingchen day of the second month of spring in the second year, the Shanshan kingdom dispatched envoys to present tribute.

sentences.zh: 夏四月庚戌，護羌校尉趙沖與漢陽太守張貢擊燒何羌於參欒，破之。

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month, Gengxu day: Protector of Qiang Colonel Zhao Chong with Hanyang Governor Zhang Gong struck Shaohe Qiang at Canlan, defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengxu day of the fourth month of summer, Protector of Qiang Colonel Zhao Chong, together with Hanyang Governor Zhang Gong, attacked the Shaohe Qiang at Canlan and defeated them.

sentences.zh: 六月乙丑，熒惑犯鎮星。

translations.literal: Sixth month Yichou day: Mars offended Jupiter.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yichou day of the sixth month, Mars offended Jupiter.

sentences.zh: 丙寅，立南匈奴守義王兜樓儲為南單于。

translations.literal: Bingyin day: Established Southern Xiongnu Guardian Righteous King Dou Lou Chu as Southern Chanyu.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingyin day, Southern Xiongnu Guardian Righteous King Dou Lou Chu was established as Southern Chanyu.

sentences.zh: 冬十月辛丑，令郡國中都官繫囚殊死以下出縑贖，各有差；

translations.literal: Winter, tenth month, XinChou day: Commanded commanderies kingdoms capital officials imprisoned prisoners death penalty and below provide silk redemption, each graded;
translations.idiomatic: On the XinChou day of the tenth month of winter, commanderies and kingdoms were commanded that capital officials' imprisoned prisoners with death penalty and below should provide silk redemption, each graded accordingly;

sentences.zh: 其不能入贖者，遣詣臨羌縣居作二歲。

translations.literal: Those unable to provide redemption, dispatched to Linqiang county to reside and labor two years.
translations.idiomatic: Those unable to provide redemption were dispatched to Linqiang county to reside and labor for two years.

sentences.zh: 甲辰，減百官奉。

translations.literal: JiaChen day: Reduced all officials' stipends.
translations.idiomatic: On the JiaChen day, all officials' stipends were reduced.

sentences.zh: 丙午，禁沽酒，又貸王、侯國租一歲。

translations.literal: BingWu day: Prohibited selling wine, moreover lent kings, marquises kingdoms rents one year.
translations.idiomatic: On the BingWu day, selling wine was prohibited, and moreover the rents of kings and marquises' kingdoms were lent for one year.

sentences.zh: 閏王，趙沖擊燒當羌於阿陽，破之。

translations.literal: Intercalary Wang: Zhao Chong struck Shaodang Qiang at Ayang, defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: In the intercalary month, Zhao Chong attacked the Shaodang Qiang at Ayang and defeated them.

sentences.zh: 十一月，使匈奴中郎將馬寔遣人刺殺句龍吾斯。

translations.literal: Eleventh month: Sent Xiongnu Colonel Ma Shi dispatched person to assassinate Julong Wu Si.
translations.idiomatic: In the eleventh month, Xiongnu Colonel Ma Shi was sent to dispatch a person to assassinate Julong Wu Si.

sentences.zh: 十二月，楊、徐盜賊攻燒城寺，殺略吏民。

translations.literal: Twelfth month: Yang, Xu bandit robbers attacked and burned city offices, killed and seized officials and people.
translations.idiomatic: In the twelfth month, Yang and Xu bandit robbers attacked and burned city offices, killing and seizing officials and people.

sentences.zh: 是歲，涼州地百八十震。

translations.literal: This year: Liang province earth shook one hundred eighty times.
translations.idiomatic: This year, the earth in Liang province shook one hundred and eighty times.

sentences.zh: 建康元年正月辛丑，詔曰：『隴西、漢陽、張掖、北地、武威、武都，自去年九月已來，地百八十震，山谷坼裂，壞敗城寺，殺害民庶。

translations.literal: Jiankang first year first month Xinchou day, decree said: 'Longxi, Hanyang, Zhangye, Beidi, Wuwei, Wudu, from last year ninth month already come, earth shook one hundred eighty times, mountain valleys split open, ruined and destroyed city offices, killed and harmed common people.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinchou day of the first month of the first year of Jiankang, a decree stated: 'Longxi, Hanyang, Zhangye, Beidi, Wuwei, and Wudu, from the ninth month of last year already, the earth shook one hundred and eighty times, mountain valleys split open, city offices were ruined and destroyed, and common people were killed and harmed.

sentences.zh: 夷狄叛逆，賦役重數，內外怨曠，惟咎嘆息。

translations.literal: Barbarians rebel and disobey, taxes labor heavy and numerous, inside outside resent and dissatisfied, only blame and sigh.
translations.idiomatic: Barbarians rebel and disobey; taxes and labor are heavy and numerous; inside and outside resent and are dissatisfied; only blame and sighing.

sentences.zh: 其遣光祿大夫案行，宣暢恩澤，惠此下民，勿為煩擾。』

translations.literal: Order dispatched Superintendent of Ceremonials to inspect and tour, proclaim and spread beneficence and favor, bestow favor on these lower people, do not create disturbance.'
translations.idiomatic: Order Superintendents of Ceremonials to be dispatched to inspect and tour, proclaim and spread beneficence and favor, and bestow favor on these lower people without creating disturbance.'

sentences.zh: 三月庚子，沛王廣薨。

translations.literal: Third month Gengzi day: Pei King Guang passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengzi day of the third month, King Guang of Pei passed away.

sentences.zh: 領護羌校尉衛琚追討叛羌，破之。

translations.literal: Acting Protector of Qiang Colonel Wei Ju pursued and attacked rebel Qiang, defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: Acting Protector of Qiang Colonel Wei Ju pursued and attacked the rebel Qiang, defeating them.

sentences.zh: 南郡、江夏盜賊寇掠城邑，州郡討平之。

translations.literal: Nanhun, Jiangxia bandit robbers invaded and plundered cities and towns, provinces and commanderies attacked and pacified them.
translations.idiomatic: Bandit robbers from Nanhun and Jiangxia invaded and plundered cities and towns; the provinces and commanderies attacked and pacified them.

sentences.zh: 夏四月，使匈奴中郎將馬寔擊南匈奴左部，破之，於是胡羌、烏桓悉詣寔降。

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month: Sent Xiongnu Colonel Ma Shi struck Southern Xiongnu left division, defeated them, thereupon Hu Qiang, Wuhuan all went to Shi to surrender.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month of summer, Xiongnu Colonel Ma Shi was sent to attack the Southern Xiongnu left division and defeated them; thereupon the Hu Qiang and Wuhuan all went to Shi to surrender.

sentences.zh: 辛巳，立皇子炳為皇太子，改年建康，大赦天下。

translations.literal: Xinsi day: Established Imperial Son Bing as Crown Prince, changed year to Jiankang, granted general amnesty to the empire.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinsi day, Imperial Son Bing was established as Crown Prince, the year was changed to Jiankang, and a general amnesty was granted to the empire.

sentences.zh: 賜人爵各有差。

translations.literal: Granted people nobility ranks each graded.
translations.idiomatic: People were granted nobility ranks, each graded accordingly.

sentences.zh: 秋七月丙午，清河王延平薨。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month, Bingwu day: Qinghe King Yanping passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingwu day of the seventh month of autumn, King Yanping of Qinghe passed away.

sentences.zh: 八月，楊、徐盜賊范容、周生等寇掠城邑，遣御史中丞馮赦督州郡兵討之。

translations.literal: Eighth month: Yang, Xu bandit robbers Fan Rong, Zhou Sheng and others invaded and plundered cities and towns, dispatched Palace Aide Censor-in-Chief Feng She to supervise provinces and commanderies troops to attack them.
translations.idiomatic: In the eighth month, Yang and Xu bandit robbers Fan Rong, Zhou Sheng and others invaded and plundered cities and towns; Palace Aide Censor-in-Chief Feng She was dispatched to supervise the provinces and commanderies' troops to attack them.

sentences.zh: 庚午，帝崩於玉堂前殿，時年三十。

translations.literal: Gengwu day: The Emperor passed away in the Jade Hall front palace, aged thirty years.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengwu day, the Emperor passed away in the Jade Hall front palace, aged thirty years.

sentences.zh: 遺詔無起寢廟，斂以故服，珠玉玩好皆不得下。

translations.literal: Testamentary edict no construction of sleeping temples, encoffined in former garments, pearls jade precious playthings all may not descend.
translations.idiomatic: The testamentary edict stated there should be no construction of sleeping temples, he should be encoffined in his former garments, and pearls, jade, and precious playthings should all not descend with him.

sentences.zh: 論曰：古之人君，離幽放而反國祚者有矣，莫不矯鑒前違，審識情偽，無忘在外之憂，故能中興其業。

translations.literal: Discourse says: Ancient person rulers, who left imprisonment exile and returned to national mandate, there were some, none not corrected and viewed former transgressions, carefully identified true and false, without forgetting outside worries, therefore able to revive their enterprise.
translations.idiomatic: Discourse: Ancient rulers who left imprisonment and exile to return to the national mandate have existed; none failed to correct themselves by viewing former transgressions, carefully identify truth and falsehood, and never forget worries from outside, therefore able to revive their enterprise.

sentences.zh: 觀夫順朝之政，殆不然乎？

translations.literal: Observe Shun's court governance, almost not so?
translations.idiomatic: Observe Shun's court governance—was it almost not so?

sentences.zh: 何其傚僻之多與？

translations.literal: Why so many imitations of the perverse?
translations.idiomatic: Why were there so many imitations of the perverse?

sentences.zh: 孝沖皇帝諱炳，順帝之子也。

translations.literal: Filial Chong Emperor taboo name Bing, Shun Emperor's son.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Chong, whose taboo name was Bing, was Emperor Shun's son.

sentences.zh: 母曰虞貴人。

translations.literal: Mother called Yu Noble Lady.
translations.idiomatic: His mother was called Noble Lady Yu.

sentences.zh: 建康元年立為皇太子，其年八月庚午，即皇帝位，年二歲。

translations.literal: Jiankang first year established as Crown Prince, that year eighth month Gengwu day, ascended emperor position, age two years.
translations.idiomatic: In the first year of Jiankang he was established as Crown Prince; that year on the Gengwu day of the eighth month, he ascended the emperor's position, aged two years.

sentences.zh: 尊皇后曰皇太后。

translations.literal: Honored Empress as Empress Dowager.
translations.idiomatic: The Empress was honored as Empress Dowager.

sentences.zh: 太后臨朝。

translations.literal: Empress Dowager attended court.
translations.idiomatic: The Empress Dowager attended court.

sentences.zh: 丁丑，以太尉趙峻為太傅；

translations.literal: Dingchou day: Made Grand Marshal Zhao Jun Grand Tutor;
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingchou day, Grand Marshal Zhao Jun was made Grand Tutor;

sentences.zh: 大司農李固為太尉，參錄尚書事。

translations.literal: Grand Minister of Agriculture Li Gu became Grand Marshal, participated in recording Masters of Writing affairs.
translations.idiomatic: Grand Minister of Agriculture Li Gu became Grand Marshal and participated in recording Masters of Writing affairs.

sentences.zh: 九月丙午，葬孝順皇帝於憲陵，廟曰敬宗。

translations.literal: Ninth month Bingwu day: Buried Filial Shun Emperor at Xian Mausoleum, temple called Jingzong.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingwu day of the ninth month, the Filial Shun Emperor was buried at Xian Mausoleum; his temple was called Jingzong.

sentences.zh: 是日，京師及太原、鴈門地震，三郡水涌土裂。

translations.literal: This day: Capital and Taiyuan, Yanmen earthquake, three commanderies water surged earth split.
translations.idiomatic: This day, there was an earthquake in the capital and Taiyuan and Yanmen commanderies; in the three commanderies, water surged and earth split.

sentences.zh: 庚戌，詔三公、特進、侯、卿、校尉，舉賢良方正、幽逸修道之士各一人，百僚皆上封事。

translations.literal: Gengxu day: Decreed Three Dukes, Specially Advanced, marquises, ministers, colonels recommend worthy upright, reclusive cultivated way gentlemen each one person, all officials all submit sealed memorials.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengxu day, the Three Dukes, Specially Advanced officials, marquises, ministers, and colonels were decreed to recommend worthy and upright gentlemen and reclusive gentlemen who cultivated the Way—one person each; all officials submitted sealed memorials.

sentences.zh: 己未，九江太守丘騰有罪，下獄死。

translations.literal: Jiwei day: Jiujiang Governor Qiu Teng had crimes, imprisoned and died.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiwei day, Jiujiang Governor Qiu Teng was found guilty of crimes and died in prison.

sentences.zh: 楊州刺史尹耀、九江太守鄧顯討賊范容等於歷陽，軍敗，耀、顯為賊所歿。

translations.literal: Yang province Inspector Yin Yao, Jiujiang Governor Deng Xian attacked bandits Fan Rong and others at Liyang, army defeated, Yao, Xian perished at hands of bandits.
translations.idiomatic: Yang province Inspector Yin Yao and Jiujiang Governor Deng Xian attacked bandits Fan Rong and others at Liyang; the army was defeated, and Yao and Xian perished at the hands of the bandits.

sentences.zh: 冬十月，日南蠻夷攻燒城邑，交阯刺史夏方招誘降之。

translations.literal: Winter, tenth month: Rinan barbarian tribes attacked and burned cities and towns, Jiaozhi Inspector Xia Fang summoned and induced surrender of them.
translations.idiomatic: In the tenth month of winter, the barbarian tribes of Rinan attacked and burned cities and towns; Jiaozhi Inspector Xia Fang summoned and induced their surrender.

sentences.zh: 壬申，常山王儀薨。

translations.literal: Renchen day: Changshan King Yi passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Renchen day, King Yi of Changshan passed away.

sentences.zh: 己卯，零陵太守劉康坐殺無辜，下獄死。

translations.literal: Jimao day: Lingling Governor Liu Kang convicted of killing innocents, imprisoned and died.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jimao day, Lingling Governor Liu Kang was convicted of killing innocents and died in prison.

sentences.zh: 十一月，九江盜賊徐鳳、馬勉等稱『無上將軍』，攻燒城邑。

translations.literal: Eleventh month: Jiujiang bandit robbers Xu Feng, Ma Mian and others called themselves 'Supreme General', attacked and burned cities and towns.
translations.idiomatic: In the eleventh month, Jiujiang bandit robbers Xu Feng, Ma Mian and others called themselves 'Supreme General' and attacked and burned cities and towns.

sentences.zh: 己酉，令郡國中都官繫囚減死一等，徙邊；

translations.literal: Jiyou day: Commanded commanderies kingdoms capital officials imprisoned prisoners reduce death penalty one rank, relocate to borders;
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiyou day, commanderies and kingdoms were commanded that capital officials' imprisoned prisoners should have their death sentences reduced by one rank and be relocated to the borders;

sentences.zh: 謀反大逆，不用此令。

translations.literal: Plotting rebellion great inversion, do not use this command.
translations.idiomatic: For those guilty of plotting rebellion and great inversion, this command was not used.

sentences.zh: 十二月，九江賊黃虎等攻合肥。

translations.literal: Twelfth month: Jiujiang bandit Huang Hu and others attacked Hefei.
translations.idiomatic: In the twelfth month, Jiujiang bandit Huang Hu and others attacked Hefei.

sentences.zh: 是歲，群盜發憲陵。

translations.literal: This year: Bandits robbed Xian Mausoleum.
translations.idiomatic: This year, bandits robbed Xian Mausoleum.

sentences.zh: 護羌校尉趙沖追擊叛羌於鹯陰河，戰歿。

translations.literal: Protector of Qiang Colonel Zhao Chong pursued and attacked rebel Qiang at Zhenyin River, perished in battle.
translations.idiomatic: Protector of Qiang Colonel Zhao Chong pursued and attacked the rebel Qiang at Zhenyin River, perishing in battle.

sentences.zh: 永憙元年春正月戊戌，帝崩於玉堂前殿，年三歲。

translations.literal: Yongxi first year spring first month Wuxu day: The Emperor passed away in the Jade Hall front palace, aged three years.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wuxu day of the first month of spring in the first year of Yongxi, the Emperor passed away in the Jade Hall front palace, aged three years.

sentences.zh: 清河王蒜徵至京師。

translations.literal: Qinghe King Zuan summoned to capital.
translations.idiomatic: Qinghe King Zuan was summoned to the capital.

sentences.zh: 孝質皇帝諱纘，肅宗玄孫。

translations.literal: Filial Zhi Emperor taboo name Zuan, Suzong's great-grandson.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Zhi, whose taboo name was Zuan, was Emperor Su's great-grandson.

sentences.zh: 曾祖父千乘貞王伉，祖父樂安夷王寵，父勃海孝王鴻，母陳夫人。

translations.literal: Great-grandfather Qiancheng True King Kang, grandfather Le'an Calm King Chong, father Bohai Filial King Hong, mother Lady Chen.
translations.idiomatic: His great-grandfather was King Kang of Qiancheng, his grandfather was King Chong of Le'an, his father was King Hong of Bohai, and his mother was Lady Chen.

sentences.zh: 沖帝不豫，大將軍梁冀徴帝到洛陽都亭。

translations.literal: Chong Emperor ill, Grand General Liang Ji summoned Emperor to Luoyang commandery pavilion.
translations.idiomatic: When Emperor Chong fell ill, Grand General Liang Ji summoned the Emperor to the Luoyang commandery pavilion.

sentences.zh: 及沖帝崩，皇太后與冀定策禁中，丙辰，使冀持節，以王青蓋車迎帝入南宮。

translations.literal: When Chong Emperor passed away, Empress Dowager with Ji decided strategy in inner palace, Bingchen day, sent Ji holding tally, with king blue canopy carriage welcomed Emperor into Southern Palace.
translations.idiomatic: When Emperor Chong passed away, the Empress Dowager together with Liang Ji decided on the strategy in the inner palace; on the Bingchen day, Liang Ji was sent holding the imperial tally to welcome the Emperor into the Southern Palace with a king's blue canopy carriage.

sentences.zh: 丁巳，封為建平侯，其日即皇帝位，年八歲。

translations.literal: Dingsi day: Enfeoffed as Marquis of Jianping, that day ascended emperor position, age eight years.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingsi day, he was enfeoffed as Marquis of Jianping; that day he ascended the emperor's position, aged eight years.

sentences.zh: 己未，葬孝沖皇帝於懷陵。

translations.literal: Jiwei day: Buried Filial Chong Emperor at Huai Mausoleum.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiwei day, the Filial Chong Emperor was buried at Huai Mausoleum.

sentences.zh: 廣陵賊張嬰等復反，攻殺堂邑、江都長。

translations.literal: Guangling bandit Zhang Ying and others rebelled again, attacked and killed Tangyi, Jiangdu magistrates.
translations.idiomatic: Guangling bandit Zhang Ying and others rebelled again, attacking and killing the magistrates of Tangyi and Jiangdu.

sentences.zh: 九江賊徐鳳等攻殺曲陽、東城長。

translations.literal: Jiujiang bandit Xu Feng and others attacked and killed Quyang, Dongcheng magistrates.
translations.idiomatic: Jiujiang bandit Xu Feng and others attacked and killed the magistrates of Quyang and Dongcheng.

sentences.zh: 甲申，謁高廟。

translations.literal: Jiashen day: Visited Gao Temple.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiashen day, he visited the Gao Temple.

sentences.zh: 乙酉，謁光武廟。

translations.literal: Yiyou day: Visited Guangwu Temple.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yiyou day, he visited the Guangwu Temple.

sentences.zh: 二月，豫章太守虞續坐贓，下獄死。

translations.literal: Second month: Yuzhang Governor Yu Xu convicted of corruption, imprisoned and died.
translations.idiomatic: In the second month, Yuzhang Governor Yu Xu was convicted of corruption and died in prison.

sentences.zh: 乙酉，大赦天下。

translations.literal: Yiyou day: Great amnesty for all under heaven.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yiyou day, a great amnesty was granted to all under heaven.

sentences.zh: 賜人爵及粟、帛各有差。

translations.literal: Granted noble ranks and grain, silk each with different amounts.
translations.idiomatic: Noble ranks and grain and silk were granted in varying amounts.

sentences.zh: 還王侯所削戶、邑。

translations.literal: Restored households, towns taken from kings and marquises.
translations.idiomatic: The households and towns that had been taken from kings and marquises were restored.

sentences.zh: 彭城王道薨。

translations.literal: Pengcheng King Dao passed away.
translations.idiomatic: King Dao of Pengcheng passed away.

sentences.zh: 叛羌詣左馮翊梁並降。

translations.literal: Rebel Qiang went to Zuo Fengyi Liang Bing and surrendered.
translations.idiomatic: The rebel Qiang went to Liang Bing of Zuo Fengyi and surrendered.

sentences.zh: 三月，九江賊馬勉稱『黃帝』。

translations.literal: Third month: Jiujiang bandit Ma Mian called himself 'Yellow Emperor'.
translations.idiomatic: In the third month, Jiujiang bandit Ma Mian called himself the 'Yellow Emperor'.

sentences.zh: 九江都尉滕撫討馬勉、范容、周生，大破斬之。

translations.literal: Jiujiang Commandant Teng Fu attacked Ma Mian, Fan Rong, Zhou Sheng, greatly defeated and beheaded them.
translations.idiomatic: Jiujiang Commandant Teng Fu attacked Ma Mian, Fan Rong, and Zhou Sheng, greatly defeating them and beheading them.

sentences.zh: 夏四月壬申，雩。

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month Renshen day: Yu sacrifice.
translations.idiomatic: On the Renshen day of the fourth month of summer, a yu sacrifice was performed.

sentences.zh: 庚辰，濟北王安薨。

translations.literal: Gengchen day: Jibei King An passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengchen day, King An of Jibei passed away.

sentences.zh: 丹陽賊陸宮等圍城，燒亭寺，丹陽太守江漢擊破之。

translations.literal: Danyang bandit Lu Gong and others besieged city, burned pavilions and temples, Danyang Governor Jiang Han attacked and broke them.
translations.idiomatic: Danyang bandit Lu Gong and others besieged the city, burning pavilions and temples; Danyang Governor Jiang Han attacked and defeated them.

sentences.zh: 五月甲午，詔曰：『朕以不德，託母天下，布政不明，每失厥中。

translations.literal: Fifth month Jiawu day: Edict said: "I by lacking virtue, entrusted mother with all under heaven, administering government unclear, each time lose its middle."
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiawu day of the fifth month, the edict said: 'Due to my lack of virtue, I entrusted my mother with all under heaven; in administering government, I have been unclear and have repeatedly missed the proper course.

sentences.zh: 自春涉夏，大旱炎赫，憂心京京，故得禱祈明祀，冀蒙潤澤。

translations.literal: From spring into summer, great drought blazing hot, anxious heart trembling, thus got to pray and beseech bright sacrifices, hoped to receive moistening favor.
translations.idiomatic: From spring into summer, there has been a great drought with blazing heat; my heart is anxiously trembling, thus I have made prayers and supplications to the bright sacrifices, hoping to receive moistening favor.

sentences.zh: 前雖得雨，而宿麥頗傷；

translations.literal: Previously although got rain, old wheat quite injured;
translations.idiomatic: Previously, although we got rain, the old wheat was quite injured;

sentences.zh: 比日陰雲，還復開霽。

translations.literal: Recent days cloudy, yet again opened clear.
translations.idiomatic: In recent days, there have been clouds, yet it has opened clear again.

sentences.zh: 寤寐永歎，重懷慘結。

translations.literal: Awake asleep long sigh, deeply cherish sorrow knot.
translations.idiomatic: Awake or asleep, I long sigh; deeply I cherish this sorrowful knot.

sentences.zh: 將二千石、令、長不崇寬和。

translations.literal: Commandery two thousand shi, magistrates, chiefs do not honor broad harmony.
translations.idiomatic: The two thousand shi officials of the commanderies, magistrates, and chiefs do not honor broad harmony.

sentences.zh: 暴刻之為乎？

translations.literal: Harsh cruel conduct towards them?
translations.idiomatic: Is it harsh and cruel conduct towards them?

sentences.zh: 其令中都官繫囚罪非殊死考未竟者，一切任出，以須立秋。

translations.literal: Command that capital officials imprisoned prisoners whose crimes are not capital punishment examinations not finished, all release them, to await beginning of autumn.
translations.idiomatic: It is commanded that capital officials' imprisoned prisoners whose crimes are not capital punishment and whose examinations are not finished should all be released, to await the beginning of autumn.

sentences.zh: 郡國有名山大澤能興雲雨者，二千石長吏各絜齊請禱，謁誠盡禮。

translations.literal: Commanderies kingdoms famous mountains great marshes able to raise clouds rain ones, two thousand shi chief officials each purify themselves pray beseech, approach with sincerity exhaust ritual.
translations.idiomatic: For famous mountains and great marshes in the commanderies and kingdoms that are able to raise clouds and rain, the two thousand shi chief officials should each purify themselves to pray and beseech, approaching with sincerity and exhausting the ritual.

sentences.zh: 又兵役連年，死亡流離，或支骸不斂，或停棺莫收，朕甚愍焉。

translations.literal: Moreover military service successive years, death exile separation, some scattered bones not gathered, some stopped coffins none collected, I greatly pity them.
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, military service in successive years has caused death and exile; some scattered bones are not gathered, some stopped coffins are not collected; I greatly pity this.

sentences.zh: 昔文王葬枯骨，人賴其德。

translations.literal: Formerly King Wen buried withered bones, people relied on his virtue.
translations.idiomatic: Formerly, King Wen buried withered bones, and the people relied on his virtue.

sentences.zh: 今遣使者案行，若無家屬及貧無資者，隨宜賜恤，以慰孤魂。』

translations.literal: Now dispatch envoys to inspect and implement, if no family relatives and poor without resources ones, according to appropriateness grant condolence, to comfort orphaned souls."
translations.idiomatic: Now dispatch envoys to inspect and implement; if there are those with no family relatives and who are poor and without resources, grant condolence according to appropriateness, to comfort the orphaned souls."

sentences.zh: 是月，下邳人謝安應募擊徐鳳等，斬之。

translations.literal: This month: Xiapi person Xie An responded to recruitment attacked Xu Feng and others, beheaded them.
translations.idiomatic: This month, Xie An of Xiapi responded to recruitment, attacked Xu Feng and others, and beheaded them.

sentences.zh: 丙辰，詔曰：『孝殤皇帝雖不永休祚，而即位踰年，君臣禮成。

translations.literal: Bingchen day: Edict said: "Filial Shang Emperor although not eternally enjoy mandate, but ascended throne over year, ruler minister ritual complete.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingchen day, the edict said: 'Although the Filial Shang Emperor did not eternally enjoy the mandate, he ascended the throne over a year, and the rituals between ruler and ministers were completed.

sentences.zh: 孝安皇帝承襲統業，而前世遂令恭陵在康陵之上，先後相踰，失其次序，非所以奉宗廟之重，垂無窮之制。

translations.literal: Filial An Emperor inherited unified enterprise, but previous generations then made Gong Mausoleum above Kang Mausoleum, before after mutually exceed, lost its sequence, not that by which to uphold ancestral temple weight, hang endless system.
translations.idiomatic: The Filial An Emperor inherited the unified enterprise, but previous generations then placed the Gong Mausoleum above the Kang Mausoleum; the precedence exceeds each other and loses its sequence, which is not the way to uphold the weight of the ancestral temple and establish an endless system.

sentences.zh: 昔定公追正順祀，《春秋》善之。

translations.literal: Formerly Duke Ding corrected proper orderly sacrifices, 'Spring and Autumn' praised it.
translations.idiomatic: Formerly, Duke Ding corrected the proper and orderly sacrifices; the 'Spring and Autumn' Annals praised it.

sentences.zh: 其令恭陵次康陵，憲陵次恭陵，以序親秩，為萬世法。』

translations.literal: Command Gong Mausoleum next to Kang Mausoleum, Xian Mausoleum next to Gong Mausoleum, to order kin ranks, be ten thousand generations law."
translations.idiomatic: Command that the Gong Mausoleum be next to the Kang Mausoleum, and the Xian Mausoleum next to the Gong Mausoleum, to order the ranks of kin and be a law for ten thousand generations."

sentences.zh: 六月，鮮卑寇代郡。

translations.literal: Sixth month: Xianbei invaded Dai commandery.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month, the Xianbei invaded Dai commandery.

sentences.zh: 秋七月庚寅，阜陵王代薨。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month Gengyin day: Fuling King Dai passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengyin day of the seventh month of autumn, King Dai of Fuling passed away.

sentences.zh: 廬江盜賊攻尋陽，又攻盱台，滕撫遣司馬王章擊破之。

translations.literal: Lujiang bandit robbers attacked Xunyiang, moreover attacked Xutai, Teng Fu dispatched Major Wang Zhang attacked and broke them.
translations.idiomatic: Lujiang bandit robbers attacked Xunyiang, and moreover attacked Xutai; Teng Fu dispatched Major Wang Zhang and attacked and defeated them.

sentences.zh: 九月庚戌，太傅趙峻薨。

translations.literal: Ninth month Gengxu day: Grand Tutor Zhao Jun passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengxu day of the ninth month, Grand Tutor Zhao Jun passed away.

sentences.zh: 冬十一月己丑，南陽太守韓昭坐贓下獄死。

translations.literal: Winter, eleventh month Jichou day: Nanyang Governor Han Zhao convicted of corruption, imprisoned and died.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jichou day of the eleventh month of winter, Nanyang Governor Han Zhao was convicted of corruption and died in prison.

sentences.zh: 丙午，中郎將滕撫擊廣陵賊張嬰，破之。

translations.literal: Bingwu day: Colonel Teng Fu attacked Guangling bandit Zhang Ying, broke them.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingwu day, Colonel Teng Fu attacked Guangling bandit Zhang Ying and defeated them.

sentences.zh: 丁未，中郎將趙序坐事弃市。

translations.literal: Dingwei day: Colonel Zhao Xu convicted of matters, executed in marketplace.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingwei day, Colonel Zhao Xu was convicted of matters and executed in the marketplace.

sentences.zh: 歷陽賊華孟自稱『黑帝』，攻殺九江太守楊岑，滕撫率諸將擊孟等，大破斬之。

translations.literal: Liyang bandit Hua Meng called himself 'Black Emperor', attacked and killed Jiujiang Governor Yang Cen, Teng Fu led various generals attacked Meng and others, greatly defeated and beheaded them.
translations.idiomatic: Liyang bandit Hua Meng called himself the 'Black Emperor', attacking and killing Jiujiang Governor Yang Cen; Teng Fu led the various generals and attacked Meng and others, greatly defeating and beheading them.

sentences.zh: 本初元年春正月丙申，詔曰：『昔堯命四子，以欽天道，《鴻範》九疇，休咎有象。

translations.literal: Benchu first year spring first month Bingchen day: Edict said: "Formerly Yao commanded four sons, to respect heaven way, 'Hongfan' nine categories, good ill have signs.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingchen day of the first month of spring in the first year of Benchu, the edict said: 'Formerly Yao commanded his four sons to respect the way of heaven; the nine categories of the "Great Plan" show signs of good and ill.

sentences.zh: 夫瑞以和降，異因逆感，禁微應大，前聖所重。

translations.literal: Indeed auspicious signs descend with harmony, anomalies arise from rebellious feelings, prohibit minute respond great, former sages valued.
translations.idiomatic: Indeed, auspicious signs descend with harmony; anomalies arise from rebellious feelings. The prohibition of minute things responding to great matters is what the former sages valued.

sentences.zh: 頃者，州郡輕慢憲防，競逞殘暴，造設科條，陷入無罪。

translations.literal: Recently, provinces commanderies lightly regard constitutional defenses, compete to show off cruelty violence, create and establish statutes regulations, entrap innocent people.
translations.idiomatic: Recently, the provinces and commanderies lightly regard the constitutional defenses; they compete to show off cruelty and violence, creating and establishing statutes and regulations that entrap innocent people.

sentences.zh: 或以喜怒驅逐長吏，恩阿所私，罰枉仇隙，至令守闕訴訟，前後不絕。

translations.literal: Some with joy anger drive away chief officials, favor flatter private favorites, punish wrongly enemy resentments, to the point that guarding palace gates lawsuits, before after not cease.
translations.idiomatic: Some drive away chief officials with joy and anger; they favor and flatter private favorites, punishing wrongly due to enemy resentments, to the point that lawsuits guarding the palace gates continue without cease.

sentences.zh: 送故迎新，人離其害，怨氣傷和，以致灾眚。

translations.literal: Sending away old welcoming new, people separate from their harm, resentful qi injure harmony, thus bring disaster calamities.
translations.idiomatic: In sending away the old and welcoming the new, people separate from their harm; resentful qi injures harmony, thus bringing disasters and calamities.

sentences.zh: 《書》云：「明德慎罰。」

translations.literal: 'Book' says: "Bright virtue careful punishment."
translations.idiomatic: The 'Book' says: 'Bright virtue and careful punishment.'

sentences.zh: 方春東作，育微敬始。

translations.literal: Just spring eastern work, nurture minute respect beginning.
translations.idiomatic: Just as spring brings eastern work, nurture the minute and respect the beginning.

sentences.zh: 其勑有司，罪非殊死，且勿案驗，以崇在寬。』

translations.literal: Command officials having authority, crimes not capital punishment, for now do not investigate verify, to honor being in leniency."
translations.idiomatic: Command the officials having authority that for crimes not capital punishment, for now do not investigate and verify, in order to honor leniency."

sentences.zh: 壬子，廣陵太守王喜坐討賊逗留，下獄死。

translations.literal: Renzi day: Guangling Governor Wang Xi convicted of attacking bandits delay, imprisoned and died.
translations.idiomatic: On the Renzi day, Guangling Governor Wang Xi was convicted of delaying in attacking bandits and died in prison.

sentences.zh: 二月庚辰，詔曰：『九江、廣陵二郡數離寇害，殘夷最甚。

translations.literal: Second month Gengchen day: Edict said: "Jiujiang, Guangling two commanderies repeatedly suffer bandit harm, ravaged devastated most severe.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengchen day of the second month, the edict said: 'The two commanderies of Jiujiang and Guangling repeatedly suffer bandit harm; they are ravaged and devastated most severely.

sentences.zh: 生者失其資業。

translations.literal: Living ones lose their property occupations.
translations.idiomatic: The living have lost their property and livelihoods.

sentences.zh: 死者委屍原野。

translations.literal: Dead ones abandon corpses on plains wilds.
translations.idiomatic: The dead lie abandoned as corpses on the plains and wilds.

sentences.zh: 昔之為政，一物不得其所，若己為之，況我元元，嬰此困毒。

translations.literal: Formerly in governing, one thing not get its place, as if oneself do it, moreover my common people, suffer this hardship poison.
translations.idiomatic: Formerly in governing, when even one thing was not in its proper place, it pained one as if he had done it himself; how much more so for my common people who suffer this hardship and poison.

sentences.zh: 方春戒節，賑濟乏戹，掩骼埋胔之時。

translations.literal: Just spring warn caution, relieve aid lacking distressed, cover bones bury remains time.
translations.idiomatic: Just as spring brings warnings and cautions, it is the time to relieve and aid those in want and distress, to cover bones and bury remains.

sentences.zh: 其調比郡見穀，出稟窮弱，收葬枯骸，務加埋卹，以稱朕意。』

translations.literal: Command transfer neighboring commanderies present grain, distribute provisions poor weak, collect bury withered bones, diligently add burial comfort, to match My intention."
translations.idiomatic: Command that neighboring commanderies transfer their present grain to distribute provisions to the poor and weak, to collect and bury withered bones, diligently adding burial comforts, in order to match My intention."

sentences.zh: 夏四月庚辰，令郡國舉明經，年五十以上、七十以上詣太學。

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month Gengchen day: Command commanderies kingdoms recommend bright classics, age fifty above, seventy above go to Imperial University.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengchen day of the fourth month of summer, it was commanded that the commanderies and kingdoms recommend those proficient in the classics aged fifty and above and seventy and above to go to the Imperial University.

sentences.zh: 自大將軍至六百石，皆遣子受業，歲滿課試，以高第五人補郎中，次五人太子舍人。

translations.literal: From Grand General to six hundred shi, all send sons receive instruction, year full test examine, with highest five persons supplement Gentlemen-in-Attendance, next five persons Crown Prince Attendants-in-Attendance.
translations.idiomatic: From Grand General to officials of six hundred shi, all must send their sons to receive instruction; when the year is full, they will be tested and examined, with the top five persons supplementing the Gentlemen-in-Attendance, and the next five persons as Crown Prince Attendants-in-Attendance.

sentences.zh: 又千石、六百石、四府掾屬、三署郎、四姓小侯先能通經者，各令隨家法，其高第者上名牒，當以次賞進。

translations.literal: Moreover thousand shi, six hundred shi, four offices subordinates, three offices Gentlemen, four surname small marquises previously able to understand classics ones, each command follow family methods, their high achievers submit name registers, should in sequence reward promote.
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, for officials of thousand shi and six hundred shi, subordinates of the four offices, Gentlemen of the three offices, and small marquises of the four surnames who previously were able to understand the classics, each is commanded to follow family methods; their high achievers shall submit name registers and will be rewarded and promoted in sequence.

sentences.zh: 五月庚寅，徙樂安王為勃海王。

translations.literal: Fifth month Gengyin day: Transfer Le'an King to Bohai King.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengyin day of the fifth month, the King of Le'an was transferred to become King of Bohai.

sentences.zh: 海水溢。

translations.literal: Sea water overflows.
translations.idiomatic: The sea water overflowed.

sentences.zh: 戊申，使謁者案行，收葬樂安、北海人為水所漂沒死者，又稟給貧羸。

translations.literal: Wushen day: Send Attendants inspect implement, collect bury Le'an, Beihai people drowned died by water, moreover distribute provisions poor weak.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wushen day, Attendants were sent to inspect and implement, to collect and bury the people of Le'an and Beihai who had drowned and died from the water, and moreover to distribute provisions to the poor and weak.

sentences.zh: 庚戌，太白犯熒惑。

translations.literal: Gengxu day: Venus violates Mars.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengxu day, Venus violated Mars.

sentences.zh: 六月丁巳，大赦天下，賜民爵及粟、帛各有差。

translations.literal: Sixth month Dingsi day: Great amnesty all under heaven, grant people noble ranks and grain, silk each with different amounts.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingsi day of the sixth month, a great amnesty was granted to all under heaven, and noble ranks and grain and silk were granted to the people in varying amounts.

sentences.zh: 閏月甲申，大將軍梁冀潛行鴆弒，帝崩於玉堂前殿，年九歲。

translations.literal: Intercalary month Jiashen day: Grand General Liang Ji secretly practiced poison assassination, Emperor passed away in Jade Hall front palace, age nine years.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiashen day of the intercalary month, Grand General Liang Ji secretly administered poison to assassinate; the Emperor passed away in the Jade Hall front palace, aged nine years.

sentences.zh: 丁亥，太尉李固免。

translations.literal: Dinghai day: Grand Marshal Li Gu dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dinghai day, Grand Marshal Li Gu was dismissed.

sentences.zh: 戊子，司徒胡廣為太尉，司空趙戒為司徒，與梁冀參錄尚書事。

translations.literal: Wuzi day: Minister of the Masses Hu Guang became Grand Marshal, Minister of Works Zhao Jie became Minister of the Masses, together with Liang Ji participated in recording Masters of Writing affairs.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wuzi day, Minister of the Masses Hu Guang became Grand Marshal, Minister of Works Zhao Jie became Minister of the Masses, and together with Liang Ji they participated in recording Masters of Writing affairs.

sentences.zh: 太僕袁湯為司空。

translations.literal: Grand Coachman Yuan Tang became Minister of Works.
translations.idiomatic: Grand Coachman Yuan Tang became Minister of Works.

sentences.zh: 贊曰：孝順初立，時髦允集。

translations.literal: Praise said: Filial Shun initially established, contemporaries truly gathered.
translations.idiomatic: In praise it is said: When Filial Shun was first established, the contemporaries truly gathered.

sentences.zh: 匪砥匪革，終淪嬖習。

translations.literal: Not whetstone not transformation, in end sink favorites custom.
translations.idiomatic: Without whetstone or transformation, they finally sank into the custom of favorites.

sentences.zh: 保阿傳土，后家世及。

translations.literal: Protect favor transmit land, empress family world reach.
translations.idiomatic: Protecting favor and transmitting land, the empress's family reached throughout the world.

sentences.zh: 沖夭未識，質弒以聰。

translations.literal: Chong young not known, Zhi assassinated by wisdom.
translations.idiomatic: Chong died young and was not known; Zhi was assassinated despite his wisdom.

sentences.zh: 陵折在運，天緒三終。

translations.literal: Mausoleums broken in fate, heaven thread three ends.
translations.idiomatic: The mausoleums were broken by fate; heaven's thread ended three times.
